column2: Varairidzi, VanaChiremba, naVanaMukoti Voramwa Mabasa
column3: Sangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ rinoti nhengo dzaro zhinji hadzina kuenda kumabasa nhasi zvichitevera kurudziro yesangano iri yekuti varairidzi vasaende kumabasa vachitsutsumwa kuhurumende nemari dzemihoro. ARTUZ inoti nhengo dzayo dzakawanda nhasi dzaswera dzichidziya mushana kudzimba dzisiri pabasa zvichitevera kurudziro yesangano iri yekuti nhengo dzaro dziramwe mabasa kubva nhasi kusvika neChishanu nepamusana pekushomeka kwemari dzemihoro dzavari kutambiriswa nehurumende. Sachigaro weARTUZ mudunhu reHarare, VaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vadzidzisi vasina kuenda kumabasa nhasi vanodarika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vatiwo vachatora matanho akasimbarara kana hurumende ikaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve isiri kuda kuvabhadhara nemadhora ekuAmerica. Zvichakadai, mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri kuGoromonzi mudunhu reMashonaland East, Amai Tinotenda Kahari, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nhuna dzevarairidzi nekukasika kuitira kuti vana vasarasikirwe nedzidzo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri werimwe sangano revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatangawo kuramwa mabasa svondo rinouya. VaZhou vati sePTUZ vachataurawo nevemamwe masangano anomirira vashandi vose vehurumende kuti vaite muonerapamwe sechuma chemuzukuru. Mutungamiri weZIMTA VaRichard Gundani vanotiwo havasi kufara nemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Zvichakadai, gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaPaul Mavhima vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti homwe yehurumende yakabooka zvekuti hurumende haikwanise kubhadhara varairidzi nemari yekunze kana kuvawedzera maRTGS parizvino. Vati zvakawanda zvine chekuita nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzemihoro yevashandi vehurumende tibvunze kugurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube avo vatisina kukwanisa kubata panharembozha yavo. Mutauriri weHealth Apex Council VaPanganai Chivese vanoti vanachiremba, vanamukoti nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vatotanga kuramwa mabasa nezuro. Vati vashandi vakawirirana kuenda kumabasa kaviri pazuva asi vachiita zvekuchinjana. Vayambira kuti hurumende ikasagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo havasi kuenda kubasa vose svondo rinouya. Vati health Services Board iyo tisina kubata yati hurumende yakanzwa chichemo chavo uye iri kuyedza kuchigadzirisa. Sangano rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti mushandi anotambira mari iri pasipasi anofanira kutambiriswa mazana matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichiwedzerwa mutengo muyika. column2: Musona asiya kutambira maWarriors
column3: MUTAMBI wenhabvu Knowledge Musona nhasi asendeka shangu dzake dzekutambira chikwata chenyika cheZimbabwe Warriors.   Pachinyorwa chaatumira, Musona uyo ange ari mutungamiri wevatambi vemaWarriors ati ave kusiya kuti ape nguva kuchikwata chake cheAl-Tai pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekutambirawo maWarriors.   “Mhuri yeZimbabwe, nhasi ndokuzivisai kuti ndamira kutambira chikwata chedu chenyika chemaWarriors. Danho iri handina kuritora nyore sezvo ndange ndave nemakore 12 ndichimirira nyika yangu, iyo ndakatanga kutambira musi wa3 Kurume 2010, mumutambo uyo takasangana neSouth Africa.   “Ndave kusiya kuti ndipe nguva kuchikwata changu pamwe nekupa vamwe vatambi mukana wekumirira maWarriors.   “Ndichagara ndine ndangariro yekutambira nyika yangu ndichienda kumitambo yakaita seyeAFCON neCOSAFA Cup, nekurwira kuenda kuWorld Cup.   “Chimwe chikuru kupihwa chiremerera chekuve kaputeni kwemakore mashanu adarika,” adaro Musona.   Mutambo wekupedzisira waMusona achitambira maWarriors waive wekuAFCON musi wa18 Ndira wekuCameroon apo maWarriors akakunda Guinea 2-1 mumutambo uyo akanwisa chibodzwa chekutanga.

column2: Zimbabwe Yosimbaradza Mitemo yeCovid-19 Lockdown
column3: Hurumende inoti yadzosa mitemo yose yakashandiswa pakatanga kubuda chirwere cheCovid-19 gore rapera sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuramba vachibatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid 19 huri kuramba huchikwira munyika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota ehurumende, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati hurumende yadzosa mirawu yose yekuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera zvose zvinodiwa kuitira kurwisa denda reCovid-19 iro riri kuramba richikura munyika. Vakati vanobatwa nemhosva yekutyora mitemo yakatanga kushandiswa gore rapera, vacharangwa zvakasimba, uye vane mabhizinesi anotyora mitemo iyi, vachatorerwa marezenisi avo. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo pane vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe vari muzvipatara zvehurumende, avo vari kushandisa zvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe kubva muzana chenzvimbo dzakachengeterwa kuti dzishandiswe nevarwere veCivid-19 muzvipatara zvehuruymende. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati makurukota ehurumende akatenderera nzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana achiona nzvimbo dziri kusangana nematambudziko anosanganisira zvekushandisa, kushomeka kwevashandi vezvehutano, kushomeka kwemweya unobatsira kufema varwere, kana medical oxygen nezvimwe. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo dare remakurukota rakurudzira kuti bazi rezvemari riwanise nechimbi chimbi mari inoita mamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nemasere kana kuti 368 million RTGS kuti ishandiswe mukuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera mitemo yeLockdown Asi munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, uye vakambove gurukorta rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti matambudziko ari kutaurwa nehurumende akagara ariko huye hurumende ingadai yakagadzirisa matambudziko aya. VaMadzorera vanotiwo vanokatyamadzwa nehuwandu hwevarwere veCovid-19 vanonzi vari muzvipatara vachiti zvimwe zvipatara zvakatozara kare nevarwere ava. Zvipatara zvehurumende zvakawanda pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa varwere veCovid-19 dzinonzi hadzina mweya wekubatsira kufema, medical oxygen, varwere veCovid-19 vanenge varwarisa. column2: VaChiwenga Vokurudzira Kuti Vanhu Vangwarire Covid-19
column3: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vakangwarira kurwisana nechirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo chiri kuramba chichitekeshera pasi rose. Vachitaura semunyarikani pakuparura chirongwa Covid-19 Charity Cycling Campaign muBulawayo, VaChiwenga vati veruzhinji munyika havachakoshesi kutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa kuitwa nevehutano pakudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus uho hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. VaChiwenga, avo vanovewo gurukota rezvehutano, vati Covid-19 iri kudzoka nehukasha kunyanya kunyika dzekumadokero vakayambira veruzhinji kuti vasaite sekuti chirwere ichi hachisisiko. VaChiwenga vati zviri kubuda pakuongorora chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika zvinoratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kukwira kupfuura huwandu hwevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere ichi vabva kunze kwenyika. Vati muAfrica, South Africa ndeimwe yenyika dziri kubatwawo nechirwere ichi vakatiwo sezvo zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri muSouth Africa, zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vangwarirewo chirwere ichi. VaChiwenga vati muBulawayo kunyanya dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura rinoisa vanhu panjodzi yekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid. Vati hurumende iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri asi havana kutsanangura zvizere. Vanhu gumi nevanomwe vachachovha mabhasikoro kubva muBulawayo vachienda kuHarare senzira yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi. Mukuru wesangano reRotary Club International muBulawayo, VaAlbert Mkandla, avo vakabatsira kuronga chirongwa ichi vaudza Studio7 kuti vaona iyi iri nzira inogona kubatsira kuti vanhu varambe vachikoshesa kudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19. Gurukota rezvemitambo, Muzvare Kirsty Coventry, pamwe nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaRaj Modi, vabatana naVaChiwenga mukusangana nevachachovha mabhasikoro ava mushure mekunge mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vaparura chirongwa ichi. Mumwe wevachovhi vemabhasikoro ari muchirongwa ichi, Nqobani Gatsheni, ati ari kufara zvikuru kuve muchirongwa ichi chekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varambe vachirwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachovhi ava vachabva muguta reBulawayo mangwana mangwanani uye vanotarisirwa kusvika muHarare mushure memazuva matanhatu. Zimbabwe yave nevanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu zviuru zvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose. column2: Nhengo dzeParamende Dzonwa Mushonga Unodzivirira Korera
column3: Nhengo dzeparamende dzapihwa mishonga yekudzivirira korera senzira yekukurudzira kuti vaparidze kunzvimbo dzavo nyaya yekudzivirira chirwere chekorera. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapurirana mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Portia Manangazira, vaudza Studio7, kuti vafara chose kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichida kuziva pamusoro pekorera nezvimwe zvirwere zvemudumbu. Vatiwo vanovimba kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzichavabatsira kusvitsa mharidzo yavo kumachechi anorambidza nhengo dzawo kuti dzinwe mishonga yekudzivirira zvirwere. Imwe nhengo yeparamende zvakare vari sachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Tabitah Khumalo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vachakurudzira vanhu munharaunda dzavo kuti vaitewo sazvavaita nhasi. Mumiriri weMbizo, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vatiwo vatora mushonga senzira yekukurudzira vanhu vemunzvimbo kuti vazvidzivirire kukorera. Nynzvi munyaya dzehutano dziri kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vamwe mushonga wekudzivirira korera, uyo uri kupihwa pachena. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere chekorera icho chinorapika nyore. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi mapfumamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi.

column2: WARRIOR AFCON 2019: DeMbare 0, Bosso 0
column3: ZVIKWATA zvinoti Dynamos FC neHighlanders hazvina kana mutambi mumwechete akasarudzwa kuti anotambira maWarriors kumakwishu eAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) pamwechete neCosafa Cup izvo zvasiyana nakare apo zvaibura vatambi vakawanda vaive shasha vaitambira chikwata chenyika ichi.   Kubva kare, DeMbare neBosso ndizvo zvaive zvikwata zvikuru muZimbabwe asi parizvino zvinotaridza kuti masamba asiyana sezvo matambiro ezvikwata izvi muPremier Soccer League adzikira zvikuru.   Kune zvimwe zvikwata izvo zvainonekwa sezvidiki zviri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   Semuenzaniso, Herentals FC ine mutambi wayo Richard Hachiro ari muchikwata chemaWarriors,  Yadah Stars ina Leeroy Mavhunga kozoti Chapungu ina Talbert Shumba neFC Platinum ina Lawrence Mhlanga.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakaita hurukuro nevakuru veBosso neDeMbare pamusoro pekudzikira kwaita zvikwata izvi munyaya dzenhabvu.   Sachigaro weHighlanders – Kenneth Mhlophe – anoti ivo sechikwata vari panguva yekuvaka izvo vakatanga gore radarika.   Anoti chikwata chavo ndicho chimwe chine vatambi vechidiki muPSL saka makore anotevera vanogona kubura vatambi vakawanda vachazotambira maWarriors.   “Isu tiri panguva yekuvaka zvakatanga gore radarika, izvi zvinozivikanwa nemunhu wese, vatambi vedu vachiri vechidiki.   “Kutaura kuno tine vatambi vaviri vakashevedzwa kuchikwata chemaUnder-23 saka zvinorakidza kuti tiri kufamba negwara chairo,” anodaro.   Anoenderera mberi achiti Prince Dube – uyo akashavedzwa kumaU-23 – ane ramangwana rakanaka.   “Tina Prince Dube, mutambi ane tarenda rinonwisa mvura. Akaenda kuSouth Africa akanokanganiswa ikoko sezvo aisatambiswa asi akadzoka tiri kumubika patsva, gore rinotevera muchamuona ari kumaWarriors.   “Iye zvino ari kumaU-23, kutoshevedzwa ikoko kunorakidza kuti varairidzi vemaYoung Warriors vanozviziva kuti ane tarenda rinodadisa,” anodaro Mhlophe.   Maneja weDeMbare – Richard Chihoro – anoti chikwata chavo gore rino chakavakwa patsva saka vatambi vavo vachiri kumbodzidzana.   “Zvamunongoziva isu gore rino takatenga vatambi vatsva saka vange vachiri kumbodzidzana, mukatarisa matambiro atiri kuita vave kuita vachibatana, vachigona uye vachisimuka.   “Zvinonetsa kuti vangotanga nekupinda musquad asi tinoziva kuti munguva inotevera kuDeMbare kuchabva vatambi vakawanda vachienda kumaWarriors. Hazviite kuti kushaye vatambi vanobva kuDeMbare vachienda kumaWarriors, kana chikwata chedu changobatana vakawanda vachaenda,” anodaro Chihoro.   Paakabvunzwa neKwayedza kuti pavatambi vari muchikwata chavo parizvino ndevapi vaanofungira kuti vanogona kukwana kumaWarriors, Chihoro anoti, “Parizvino kutaura chokwadi hapana mutambi watinaye anokwana kumaWarriors.”   Zvakadai, nemusi weMugovera uno maWarriors achatanga kurwira kuchengetedza mukombe wavo weCosafa Cup apo achasangana nechikwata chichapedza chiri pamusoro muboka reGroup A kuDurban, kuSouth Africa.   Chikwata chaSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa chiri kushandisa makwishu aya segadziro dzemutambo weAfcon uyo uchatanga nemusi wa21 Chikumi apo maWarriors achasangana neEgypt.   Mumakwishu ekupedzisira eAfcon ayo akaitirwa kuGabon mugore ra2017, DeMbare yaive nevatambi vaviri vaive muchikwata chemaWarriors vaiti Tatenda Mkuruva uyo aive mubati wepagedhi naElisha Muroiwa uyo aivhara bhora pamwechete naCosta Nhamoinesu.   Bosso yakapedzisira kuita vatambi vakapinda muchikwata chemaWarriors mugore ra2017 apo paiva naPrince Dube naHonest Moyo avo vakatakurwa naMhofu kuenda kuCosafa Cup. Muchikwata ichi maive zvakare naOcean Mushure weDynamos uyo akatamba zvainwisa mvura.

column2: Nyanzvi yeHutano hwePfungwa Yokurudzira Kutsigirwa kweVarwere vePfungwa neVehukama
column3: Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano hwepfungwa inoti zvakakosha chose kuti vanhu vane dambudziko rehutano hwepfungwa vapiwe rutsigiro nevanhu vari pedyo navo kuitira kuvabatsira kuti vakwanise kurarama munharaunda dzavagere. Doctor William Guri, avo vanoshanda neboka rezvehutano hwepfungwa kuvana vadiki kuBritain, vanoti basa ravo ndere kupa rutsigiro muzvikoro, kuvana, kuvadzidzisi nekuvabereki, nechinangwa chekuti vana vakwanise kuwana rutsigiro vachiri vadiki kuitira kuti vazokura vakasimba muhutano hwavo hwepfungwa. Doctor Guri vanoti basa rehutano hwepfungwa rinogona kuonekwa nevamwe sebasa risina kukosha, asi ibasa rakaskosha kwazvo rinofanirwa kutsigirwa nedzihurumende pamwe neveruzhinji. Vanoti pane zvakawanda zvinokonzera kuti munhu arware nepfungwa, zvinosanganisira kuomerwa nehupenyu, hurwere hweshuramatongo hweHIV/AIDS, kana kushaya basa chaiko. Doctor Guri vanotiwo ongororo dzavari kusanganawo nadzo dziri kuratidza kuti chirwere chiriko iye zvino ichi che Covid-19, chiri kukonzerawo zvakare kuti vanhu vakanganiswe hutano hwepfungwa kuburikidza nekugara vanhu vakavharirwa mudzimba vasingasangane nevamwe kungava kumabasa, kunzvimbo dzekudyira, kana kumitambo. Vanotiwo murwere weCovid-19 kana akasashanyirwa kuchipatara nehama neshamwari, anogona kukanganisika pfungwa zvakare. No media source currently available

column2: Madzimai Anoshanyira South Africa Onyunyuta neKurambidzwa Kupinda neMapiritsi eKuronga Mhuri
column3: Madzimai ari kushanya kuSouth Africa haasi kufara nekutorerwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kwaari kuitwa nevashandi vanoona nezvekupinda nekubuda kwevashanyi muSouth Africa. Madzimai aya anoti ari kubvumirwa kupinda nepakiti imwechete iyo inenge iyine mapiritsi anokwana mwedzi mumwechete. Madzimai aya anoti izvi zvinoita kuti azopedzesera oshandisa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa ayo vakawanda vanoti anovarwarisa zvinosanganisira kubuda ropa kwenguva yakareba. Amai Getrude Tarumbwa, avo vanodzidzisa kuPretoria, vanoti kurambidzwa mapiritsi akawanda anovakwanira kunozovamanikidza kunwa mapiritsi ekuSouth Africa ayo anovarwarisa, uye kubuda ropa rakawanda. Amai Tarumbwa vanoti munhu anofanirwa kubvumirwa mapiritsi anoenderana nenguva yaanenge abvumirwa kugara muSouth Africa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naAmai Patricia Zuze, avo vanoenda kunotengesa zvinhu zvakaita semidziyo yemumba yakagadzirwa nemiti kuSouth Africa. Amai Zuze, avo vanogara mwedzi miviri kana mitatu vachitengesa, vanoti kutorerwa mapiritsi kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo uye vanozomanikidzwa kunwa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri ekuSouth Africa avanoti anovarwarisa. Nekuda kwekurambidzwa kwemapiritsi akawanda pabhodha, mamwe madzimai ave kuita bhizinisi rekuenda nemapiritsi achinotengesera zvizvarwa zvemunyika zviri kuSouth Africa. Pakiti rimwe chete, iro rinopihwa pachena munyika rinotengeswa nemari iri pakati pemaRands zana nemakumi mashanu nemazana maviri zvichienderana nekuti munhu ari kuatengesera kunzvimbo ipi muSouth Africa. Amai Roselyne Chitani mumwe wemadzimai anotengesa mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri kuSouth Africa. Vatyairi vemabhazi anoenda kuSouth Africa vanoyambirawo vanhu vavanenge vakatakura zvinhu zvisingabvumirwe kupinda munyika iyi kuitira kuti vasazobatwa vachinzi vari kutakura vanhu vanopinda nezvinhu zvisingabvumirwe. Mutyairi webhazi reFirst Class, VaFrank Muguti, vachiyambira vashanyi vechidzimai kuti vasatakure mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri akawanda. Zvinhu zvakaita semufushwa, manhanga, nzimbe muriwo hazvibvumirwe kupinda nazvo pabhodha. Munhu anowanikwa nazvo anotorerwa uye haazobvumirwa kupinda munyika iyi musi waanenge abatwa. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Brg Gerald Gwinji, vanoti vachaongorora nyaya iyi vachiti hazvisi pamutemo kuti vanhu varambidzwe kana kuita zvinotadzisa kuti munhu atore mushonga wake sezvinenge zvataura chiremba. Hatina kunzwa divi reSouth Africa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Dzidziso yeNhomba yeCovid-19 Yokurudzirwa Kupihwa Veruzhinji
column3: Mukuru wesangano riri kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 rePerch Media, VaCollen Magobeya, vanoti vapedza kubayiwa nhomba dzavo mbiri vachiti semunhu anoshanda neveruzhinji zvinovabatsira kuti vasatapurirwa kana kutapurira vamwe chirwere. VaMagobeya vanoti havo dzidziso ichiri kudiwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise nezvenhomba iyi kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisadzoke zvakare zvine hukasha. Zimbabwe ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi. Asi vanhu vabayiwa nhomba iyi kusvika pari zvino vachiri vashoma zvichienzaniswa nevanotarisirwa kunge vabayiwa. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi, tabata VaMagobeya. No media source currently available

column2: National Aids Council Yobatsira Vagari vemuBulawayo Pachena
column3: Vamwe vanhu vanogara kunze kweguta reBulawayo nemusi weChina vakaongororwa ropa, chirwere cheshuga, maziso nezvimwe pachena pasi pechirongwa cheNational Aids Council. Chirongwa ichi chakaitwa kunzvimbo yeRobert Sinyoka Primary School kunze kweguta reBulawayo pasi pechirongwa cheNational AIDS Council chekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaongororwe ropa ravo. Mukuru weLuveve District Aids Awareness Committee Amai Priscilla Mac-Isaac vakaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa ichi chaitwa neNAC ichishanda nemamwe masangano akasiyana-siyana, uye chakanangana nevanhu vanoonekwa vari panjodzi yekutapurirwa hutachiwana hweHIV. Vamwe vevanhu vakauya kuchirongwa ichi vakakwanisa kuongororwa ropa ravo pamwe nezvimwe vakati vakafara nechirongwa ichi sezvo chakaunzwa kwavari. Mumwe wevanhu vakabatsirwa ndemumwe wevechidiki anonzi Thomas Nyoni uyo ati anoziva kuti zvakakosha kuti munhu azive kuti ropa rake rine hutachiwana hweHIV here kana kuti kwete. Asi ati vanhu vakawanda vemunharaunda yenzvimbo yeRobert Sinyoka vanotadza kuita izvi nekuti vanoshaya mari yekuenda kuzvipatara zviri pedyo. Izvi zvakatsigirwawo nemumwe musikana uyo angoda kudeedzwa nezita rekuti Patience. Muzvare Margaret Mucheki avo vati vakabatwa nechirwere chemaziso chinonzi glaucoma vati vafarawo kuti vakwanisa kutariswa maziso avo pachena. Amai Mac-Isaac vati veNAC vave kugara vachiita zvirongwa zvekuenda muvanhu senzira yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vazive pavamire mairirano nehutachiwana hweHIV/ Aids. Pachirongwa ichi painge paine mamwe masanganowo akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira veZimbabwe National Family Planning Council avo vange vachidzidziswawo nezvekuronga mhuri kuchishandiswa nzira dzekudzivirira kubata pamuviri dzakasiyana-siyana. Mamwe masangano akadai seJustice for Children Trust neChildline vange varipowo vachidzisa vanhu pamusoro pekodzero dzevana uye nezvekudzivirira kushungurudzwa kwevana. column2: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muAmerica, VaNdenda, Vobata Pamwe neMasangano Akawanda muKusimudzira Vechidiki neNharaunda kuZimbabwe
column3: Muchirongwa chedu chatinotarisa zviri kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika, svondo rino tine hurukuro naVaInnocent Ndenda vari mudunhu reTexas muAmerica asi vachibva kuHwedza mudunhu reMashonaland East. VaNdenda, avo vakaenda kuAmerica muna 2016, vanoti kunyange hazvo vachishanda samaneja pane imwe kambani kwakare kuTexas, vakaramba vachienderera mberi nemabasa avo avaiita vachiri kumusha, ekubatsira vanoshaya pamwe nekusimudzira nharaunda yavanobva. Pari zvino vanoti vari kushanda nemasangano matatu anoti reMubatirapamwe Trust, iro rinobatsira vanenge vachishandisa zvinodhaka, reMakoni North District Association, rakanangana nenyaya dzebudiriro, pamwe nereGlobal Exchange Program, iro rinobatanidza vanhu vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. VaNdenda vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuona vana veZimbabwe vachiisa misoro pamwe vosiyana nehumbimbindoga, vachiti chose chinezwi rekuti kubatana chinobudirira. Vanoti ivowo vane shuviro yekuti vange vachizorangarirwawo mune remangwana semunhu akabatsira mukushanda nevamwe kubatanidza vanhu kuti vavandudze magariro avo. No media source currently available

column2: VaPromise Mkwananzi veTajamuka Vogariswa Mujeri
column3: Mutauriri weTajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi avo vakazvipira kumapurisa nemusi weChishanu vave kugara mutirongo mushure mekunge mutongi wedare ramejastiriti muHarare ati haasi kunzwa zvakanaka akati nyaya iyi izonzwikwa neMuvhuro. VaMkwananzi vakaenda kunozvipira kumapurisa negweta ravo VaTrust Maanda vanova nhengo yeZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR. Rimwe rinova nhengo yeZLHR, VaJerremiah Bamu vakaudza Studio 7 kuti pavakaenda kumapurisa ekuHarare Central neimwe nyaya yavanhu vakasungwa mukuratidzira kwemusi weChitatu, vakaudzwa kuti mapurisa ari kutsvaga VaMkwananzi uye Pastor Evan Mawarire veHash Tag This Flag. Mapurisa ainge ambobvunzurudzawo VaStern Zvorwadza avo vari kutungamirawo kuratidzira munyika. VaMkwananzi vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vainge vakazvipira kuenda kumapursa nekuti kuratidzira kwavari kuita kunotenderwa nebumbiro remutemo. Pastor Mawarire vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti pane vanhu vari kuvafonera vachiva tyisidzira uye kuvatevera nekuuya kuhofisi yavo. Mapuria akasunga vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu uye ari kutsvaga kusunga vamwe nekuyedza kudzisiva kumwe kuratidzira kwadaidzirwa nemusi weChitatu nemusi wechina svondo rinouya. Vari kuratidziora vanoda kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vaferefete vari kuita zvehuori zvikuru makurukota avo, kutambirisa vashandi vehurumende mari dzavo dzemihoro nenguva uye kubvisa mutemo uri kurambidza kupinda kwezvinhu munyika zvakaita sezvekuduya zviri kutengeswa nevanhu kuti vararame. Vamwe vari kutiwo VaMugabe ngavasiye basa nekuti vakundikana. Asi VaMugabe nemusi weChishanu vakave nemukana wekutaura nezvezvichemo izvi apo vakaita musangano kunhandare yeChipadze kuBindura asi vakangoti zvinhu zvaoma nekuti Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango nevekunze.

column2: Varairidzi Vanombomisa Kuramwa Mabasa Mushure meMusangano neHurumende
column3: Varairidzi vanga vachiramwa mabasa vachida kuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo zvemihoro nemari nekubatsirikana, vanoti vambomisa kuramwa mabasa uku mushure mekuvimbiswa nehurumende kuti iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo nekukasika. Izvi zvinotevera musangano wechimbichimbi waitwa nevamiriri vevaraidzi vemasangano ose evarairidzi negurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima masikati. Nhengo yerimwe remasangano apinda mumusangano uyu, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaAbiot Moyo, avo vanomirira varairidzi vakaremara, vanoti masangano ose awirirana kuti vambopa hurumende mukana wekugadzirisa zvinhu, ivo vachimbomisawo kuramwa mabasa uku. VaMoyo vanoti vari kutarisira kusangana zvakare nevamiriri vehurumende pakati pesvondo rino. Vanotiwo hurumende yavavimbisa kuti vose vakanga vari pakuramwa mabasa havasi kuzotorerwa matanho sezvakanga zvamboziviswa neboka reCivil Service Commission, iyo yakanga yazivisa kuti vose vakaramwa mabasa vaizobatirwa mari dzemazuva avasina kushanda. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata Muzvinafundo Mavhima kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Vanopikisa Vanoti VaMliswa Ndivo Vanofanirwa Kumirira Hurungwe West Kwete VaGuzah
column3: Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iri kushorwa zvakanyanya nemabatiro ayakaita sarudzo yemuHurungwe West, uko inoti VaKeith Guzah veZanu-PF vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo kunyange hazvo vange vasiri mugwaro revavhoti. ZEC inoti VaGuzah vakakumbira kuti vabviswe kuMagunje vachienda kuHurungwe West asi pakaita matambudziko pakuita izvi zvakapa kuti izvi zvisaitwe. Asi ZEC inoti kubvumidza kwayakaita VaGuzah kuti vavhoterwe musarudzo yeHurumengwe West zviri pamutemo. ZEC yatendawo kuti VaGuzah havana kukwanisa kuvhota nekuda kwekuti zita ravo rainge risiri mugwaro revavhoti mudunhu iri. VaGuzah vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chavangataure panyaya iyi pari zvino. Asi vakakwikwidza musarudzo iyi vakazvimirira, VaTemba Mliswa, vanoti VaGuzah havafanire kunge vachimirira Hurungwe West nekuti mapepa avo avakashandisa pasrudzo iyi akange asina kumira zvakanaka. No media source currently available Mutungamiri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, uye vari muzvinafundo panyaya yemitemo, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanoti mashoko eZEC anoshoresa zvikuru. VaMadhuku vanoti kana VaGuzah zita ravorakanga risiri mugwaro revavhoti zvinoreva kuti havana kodzero dzekuvhoterwa mudunhu iri izvo zvinopa kuti VaMliswa vagadzwe semumiriri wedunhu iri muparamende. column2: Tiri pa’tight’: Dynamos
column3: CHIKWATA cheDynamos chinoti kunyangwe zviite sei hachife chakabuda muligi reCastle Premiership zvisinei nekuti parizvino chiri panguva yakaoma apo chiri kuswedera pedyo nekuburitswa kuti chiende kunokwikwidza kuDivision One.   Mwaka wegore rino hausi kufamba zvakanaka kuchikwata ichi icho chinozivikanwa sechikuru munyika yese panyaya dzenhabvu sezvo chiine mikombe yakawanda yachakahwina yeligi nemimwe.   Asi matambiro ari kuita DeMbare mwaka uno haasi kugutsa zvaita kuti chive chimwe chezvikwata zvave kurwira kuti chisaburitswe muCastle Premiership.   Maneja weDynamos – Richard Chihoro – anotsidza kuti kunyangwe zviite sei DeMbare kana kuti Glamour Boys haife yakaburitswa muCastle Premiership uye ichatosunga dzisimbe mumitambo yayo yasara kuti ipone.   “Izvozvo manje ndizvo zvisingambofe zvakaitika. Kukutaurirai pachokwadi, Dynamos hapana kwainoenda, chinodiwa chete kuti tigadzirise pari kukanganisika chete.   “Tinofanirwa kungotaura nevakomana kuti vagadzirise pari kukanganisika chete tigosimukira. Rangarirai kuti ichi chikwata ndicho chakapedza chiri pechipiri mwaka wadarika nevatambi vachinacho, asi pane vashoma vakaita saChristian Epoupa vakazobva uye vamwe ndivo vari kutamba saka zvinogadzirika. Hatibude ipapo ndinoramba,” anodaro Chihoro.   Dynamos yasarirwa nemitambo misere kuti mwaka wa2018 upere uye pamitambo yose iyi iri kufanirwa kuhwina mina kuti isaburitswe muligi iri.    Mumitambo iyi, ichasangana nezvikwata zvinoti CAPS UNITED, Bulawayo Chiefs, FC Platinum, Black Rhinos, Herentals, Triangle United, Mutare City neNichrut.   Achibvuzwa kuti nhabvu yemuno ingazonakidze here kana Dynamos isisimo muPSL, Chihoro anoti,  “Hatingafunge nezvazvo nekuti hapana kwatiri kuenda, tiri kudzoka, gore rino range risiri redu chete.”   Kwayedza yakaitawo hurukuro nemukushi wemashoko weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela, ichida kunzwa kuti kana Dynamos ikaburitswa muCastle Premiership zvinokanganisa nhabvu yemuno here, iye ndokuti, “Hatisi n’anga kuno kuZifa, hatisi anagodobori, hatizive zvichaitika. Saka ngatitange taona kuti mwaka uchapera sei, tozotangira ipapo. Kana chikwata chichikwikwidza muPSL zvinorakidza kuti chikuru saka zvese zvinofanirwa kurwa kuti zvirambe zvirimo, kana chinenge chakurirwa munochiona nekuburitswa,” anodaro Gwesela.   Mutungamiri wevatsigiri veDynamos, Benjamin Munzira, anoti iye zvino yave nguva yekuti munhu wese anozviti anoda chikwata ichi achitsigire kuti morari yevatambi isimukire vagorwa semvumba varambe vari muPSL.    Anoti pakagara chikwata chavo pakashata chaizvo uye hachifanirwe kuve chiri ipapo.   “Iyi haisiriyo DeMbare yatinoziva, payave pakaoma, patambo chaipo inofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti isimuke. Handizvo zvatinoitarisira kuti ive ichiita, saka zvinotoda kuti tibatane tose tinoti tinoda chikwata ichi chisimuke kubva pachiri.   “Vatambi vacho vari kuda kusimudzirwa saka zvinotoda isu vatsigiri tibatane tiwane zvatinovaitira kuvafadza kuti vasadzikire, shuwa iyi handiyo DeMbare yatinoziva,” anodaro Munzira.    Shasha pakutsigira nhabvu Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa anoti haatombode kufunga nezvekuburitswa kweDynamos muCastle Premiership achiti vamwe varairidzi vakamboirairidza kare vakaita saSunday Chidzambwa, Kalisto Pasuwa uye Moses Chunga ngavauye vabatsire Lloyd Mutasa mumitambo yasara kuti chikwata chake chisaburitswe muPSL.   Anoti pave kudiwa mushandirapamwe nekuti pachimire hapana kunaka uye hapasipo panotarisirwa kuti chinge chiri.   “Shasha dzakambotambira chikwata ichi uye vamwe vakambochirairidza vakaita saMhofu Chidzambwa naPasuwa ngavabatsire Mutasa nekuti basa iri harichade ari ega, zvave kutoda kubatsirana kuti basa rifambe mitambo yese yasara ihwiniwe chikwata chigare muPSL machakakodzera,” anodaro Romario.

column2: Amai Makarau Vanoramwa Kupinda Musangano Vachiti Vaneta neKunyombwa
column3: Musangano wange wakarongwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika watadza kuitwa muHarare neChipiri mushure mekunge sachigaro weZEC, Justice Rita Makarau, vabuda mumusangano uyu vachiti vaneta nekubatwa neseri kweruwoko nemapato aya. Amai Makarau, avo vange vakatsamwa zvikuru, vaudza vamiriri vemapato aya, kuti semaonero avo, misangano yavanoita nemapato aya haisi kushanda nekuti nekudaro vachagara pasi seZEC voona kuti voita sei. Vati mapato aya anovashoropodza nekutaura zvisina kunaka pamusoro pavo mumapenhau nyaya dzinofanira kutaurwa mumusangano wakaita sewange uchifanira kuitwa neChipiri. Amai Makarau vapawo mapato muenzaniso wenyaya dzakabuda mumapenhau eThe Daily News pamwe NewsDay uye vati havasi kuzobvuma kuramba vachibatwa neseri kurowoko nemapato aya. Vatiwo musangano wanhasi wange usinei nekuda kuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa mangwana nemamwe mapato ange auya kumusangano uyu. Amai Makarua vabva vaudza dzimwe nhengo dzeZEC nevashandi vekomisheni iyi kuti vabude muimba mange muchifanira kuitirwa musangano uyu ndokuenda kuhofisi kwavo vachisiya vamiriri vemapato aya vari vega. Asi izvi hazvina kufadza vamiriri vemapato ange auya kumusangano. Vamwe vamiriri vemapato aya vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa naAmai Makarau kuvashora zvakanyanya uye vanofanira kuziva kuti vanobhadharwa nemari yemitero inobhadharwa neveruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Asi mushure mechinguvana, mapato aya azobvumirana kutuma nhume dzawo kunoita musangano naAmai Makarau muhofisi mavo. Vachitaura apo vapedza musangano naAmai Makarau, munyori mukuru weMDC – T, zvakare vari mutauriri wekomiti yemapato ezvematongerwo enyika panhaurirano neZEC, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati vaudza Amai Makarau kuti vakapedzesera vaenda kumapepanhau nekuti ZEC yange isina kupindura tsamba yavo pamusoro pekutengwa kwemichina ye Biometric Voter Registration. Asi VaMwonzora vati vazobvumirana naAmai Makarau kuti vanofanira kuramba vachiita misangano nemapato aya asi panofanira kurongwa kuti hwaro hwekuti misangano iyi ichafamba sei. Asi dzimwe nhengo dzemapato aya dzakaita saVaKudakwashe Bhasikiti vePeople First, vati mapato aya anofanira kuchisiyana neZEC otsvaga imwe nzira yekuti sarudzo dzingafambiswa sei munyika. VaKizito Kuchekwaavo vanoshanda kubazi reCommisariat reZanu PF vati bato ravo haritsigiri zvaitwa nemasangano ari muNational Electoral Reform Agenda pamwe neCoalition for Democracy uye vati semaonero avo danho ratorwa naAmai Makarau rakanaka. Zvichakadai, veNERA vanoti pamvumo yavapihwa yekuratidzira, vanzi panofanira kuungana vanhu vasingadarike zviuru zviviri nemakumi mashanu uye havasi kubvumidzwa kufamba mumigwagwa. Mapurisa anoti vanhu ava vanofanira kuungana panhandareiri kuseri kweHarare International Conference Centre uye vanhu gumi chete ndivo vachabvunmidzwa kunosiya gwaro renyunyuto kuna Amai Makarau. Mapato ari muNERA anoti haasi kufara kuti hurumende yava kuda kutora hurongwa kwekutenga michina yeBVR kubva kuUnited Nations Development Fund sezvo achifungira kuti izvi zvinoita kuti hurumende ipindire mumafambisirwo esarudzo dza2018. column2: MaSoccer star aripi?. . . vamwe votambura, vamwe zviri kufaya
column3: KUPERA kwemwaka wega-wega wenhabvu makore ese kunopihwa mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kumutambi anenge atamba zvinonwisa mvura kudarika vamwe vose.   Vatambi vakagashidzwa mubairo uyu vanosanganisira George Shaya, Shacy Tauro, Moses Chunga, Peter Ndlovu, Wilfried Mugeyi naAgent Sawu uye vamwe vachingobva kuhwina mubairo uyu vakabva vawana mukana wekuenda kunotambira kunze kwenyika.   Asi makore adarika, vamwe vatambi vakahwina mubairo uyu vakakundikana kusvika kure mumutambo uyu. Mubvunzo unouya pakadai ndewekuti saka vanosarudza mutambi anozogachidzwa mubairo uyu vanovhotera mutambi chaiye here kana kuti kungosarudza wavanenge vachida?   Ongororo kubva mugore ra2010, inotaridza kuti vatambi vanoti Charles Sibanda (2010), Washington Arubi (2011), Denver Mukamba (2012), Tawanda Muparati (2013), Dennis Dauda (2014), Danny Phiri (2015), Hardlife Zvirekwi (2016) naRodwell Chingetere (2017) vakahwina mubairo uyu.   Pavatambi ava, vatatu chete vanoti Arubi, Mukamba naPhiri ndivo vakakwanisa kutengwa nezvikwata zvekuSouth Africa, asi Mukamba akadzoka mushure mekanguva kadiki. Charles Sibanda (2010)

column2: VaNkosana Moyo Vanoti Huori, Kwete Zvirango, Ndizvo Zvauraya Nyika
column3: Mutungamiri webato ronopikisa reAlliance for the People's Agenda kana kuti APA, Doctor Nkosana Moyo, vanoti nyaya yehuori kwete zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika ndiyo yakonzera kuti nyika ipinde mumadhaka mairi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Doctor Moyo, avo vari kufamba vachisangana nevanhu pakutsvaga rutsigiro vasingaite misangano mukuru, vanoti vari kufara nezvavari kuita uye vanofunga kuti vachakunda musarudzo. VaMoyo vanotiwo havana hurongwa hwekubatana nemamwe mapato sezvo vachiti zviri kuvanhu veZimbabwe kuti vasarudze mutungamiri wavanoda kwete kuti vatungamiri vemapato vapanane zvigaro. column2: Vakawanda Vanoti Kugadzikana kweHupfumi Hakuna Zvakuri Kubatsira Varombo
column3: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zvirongwa zvehurumende zvairi kuparura ichiti zviri kusimbisa hupfumi hwenyika, zviri kutopa kuti varombo vanyanye kushupika. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, naGavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakaparura zvirongwa zvavo zvemafambisirwo emari nehupfumi asi vachivimbisa kuti havasi kubuda mugwara ravari sezvo vachiti rinodzikamisa hupfumi. Zvirongwa izvi zvakatambirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi dzichiyambira kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zvakawanda zvinenge zviri kusiya varombo vachinonga svosve nemuromo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti zakaturwa naVaMangudya zvakanaka chose panyaya yekusadhinda mari yakawanda uye kuwanise mari makambani kuburikidza nemusika wemari. Asi vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iwedzere vashandi mari vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vanoti hurumende yakwanisa kudzikamisa mitengo, dhora remunyika nekusimudzira zvigadzirwa kumaindustry asi vachitsinhirawo nyaya yekuti vashandi vabhadharwe mari dzinovakwanira kuti vakwanise kutenga zviri kugadzirwa kumaindasitiri zvacho. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vatiwo VaNcube vanofanira kuendesa mari kuzvirongwa zvekubatsira varombo munyaya dzedzidzo uye hutano sezvo vakawanda vari kutatarika nekuda kwekunzi vagare mudzimba vasingashande nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vachitaura kumarinda eHeroes Acre nezuro, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo chinangwa chavo ndechekuti Zimbabwe inge yave nyika ine vashandi vakati wandei vanotambirawo mari dziri nani kana kuti upper middle-class economy mugore ra2030. Zimbabwe inoti iri kutarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nekuda kwegoho rakanaka regore rino asi nyaya yekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 inonzi inogona kukanganisa zvakanyanya hupfumi sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri kuenda kumabasa. column2: Bill Antonio atengwa kuBelgium
column3: BILL Antonio ari kuramba achinyora nhoroondo mumutambo wenhabvu muZimbabwe. Mutambi wechidiki weDynamos uyu atengwa nechikwata cheKV Mechelen chekuBelgium.   Antonio anotarisirwa kuenda kuchikwata chake chitsva kunosangana nevatambi vaachange achitamba navo kuchikwata chekuEurope ichi.   Ange achitarisirwa kuongororwa utano hwake asati anyorerana chibvumirano nechikwata ichi apo ave kutanga rwendo rwake rwutsva munhabvu aine makore 19 okuberekwa bedzi. Mutambi akadzidza paPrince Edward uyu akaonekana nechikwata chake cheDynamos ndokuudza vatori venhau kuti ari kutarisira kunodzidza zvakawanda kuBelgium.   Antonio akafarirwa neMechelen zvichitevera kutamba kwaakaita masvondo adarika apo aiongororwa. Paimbove nefungidziro yekuti mutambi uyu aigona kuzotengwa gore rinotevera munaNdira, izvo zvaigona kuzomutadzisa kuenda kuchikwata ichi izvozvi.   Asi Antonio ava kutarisirwa kunyora chibvumirano chake mukana wekutenga vatambi kuBelgium usati wavharwa. Audza vatori venhau kuti zvose zvauya kuburikidza nekushanda nesimba uye acharamba achishanda nemwoyo wake wose kuBelgium.   “Zvinhu zvose unofanirwa kutungamidza Mwari. Kuenda kuEurope ndichibva kuDynamos kuita kwaMari kubva pakutanga. Kunamata mazuva ose kunoita kuti zvinhu zviendeke,” akadaro Antonio.   “Rutsigiro rwandange ndichiwana kubva zuva rekutanga handirwukanganwe uye handimbokoshiwa mhuri yeDynamos. Zvaifadza kutamba ndakapfeka jezi ravo, zvinhu zvekuti mutambi wose anongoshuvira. “Iniwo nemakore angu kutambira Dynamos, zvinhu zvekuti handaimbofungira kuti zvichaitika kwandiri, asi unoona kuti naMwari zvose zvinoitika.   “Muupenyu mune zvitsauko zvakawanda, kuenda kwangu kuEurope kutanga kwechimwe chitsauko chitsva uye kuzadzikiswa kwezvishuviro zvemwoyo wangu.   “Ndinovimba kuti ndichabudirira. Mwari haambokurasise, unoziva. Kungoshanda nesimba nekuterera, zvose zvinoita chete.”   Antonio akatanga kutambira Dynamos gore radarika uye angotamba mitambo 28 ndokunwisa kasere achibatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa ka10.

column2: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kutaura neIzwi Rimwe Chete paNyaya yeCovid-19
column3: Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende itaure nezwi rimwe chete panyaya yekubayiwa kwevanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 uye kuti inopinda munyika riini. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutevedzeri vavo, uye ari gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakazivisa nyika nezuro, China, kuti vanhu vachabayiwa nhomba iyi pachena sezviri kuitwa kune nyika dzakawanda. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko anopesana ainge ataurwa negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vakamboti vanhu vachabhadhariswa mari yenhomba, asi vakazobuda vachiti vatori venhau vainge vasina kubata mashoko avo nemazvo. Kunyange hazvo VaNcube vakabuda vachipikisa zvainge zvaburitswa nesangano enhau, pane vhidhiyo iri kuburitsa VaNcube mbune vachiti mushonga uyu uchange uchitengeswa. Asi VaNcube vakazoti nhomba iyi ichapihwa vainoida pachena. Izvi ndizvo zviri kunzi naVaRusike hurumende inofanirwa kutaura neizwi rimwe chete zvikuru panyaya yakakosha kudai. column2: Varwere Voburitswa Muzvipatara Sezvo Musina Vashandi
column3: Chipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi chavhara mawadhi akawanda nekuda kwekushomeka kwavana mukoti avo vari kuramwa mabasa nyika yose. Mukuru wechipatara ichi, VaCollet Mawire, vanoti vakamanikidzwa kuvhara mawadhi evarume nemadzimai evanorwara, medical ward, pamwe nemawadhi evarume nemadzimai evanorwara nezvinoonekwa, surgical ward nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwana mukoti vanosvika mazana matatu. VaMawire vanoti varwere vose vakaiswa muwadhi yemadzimai ari kutarisira kusununguka sedanho rekuti varapwe nanamukoti vashoma varipo. VaMawire vanoti kunyange zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara vanoti havasati vafirwa nevanhu zvine chekuita nekuramwa basa kwana mukoti. Vamwe varwere vakaburitswa muchipatara vari kushora danho ravana mukoti rekuramwa mabasa vachisiya vanhu vachirwara muchipatara. Mumwe murwere asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti vana mukoti havafanirwe kukoshesa mari kudarika hupenyu hwevanhu. VaGilbert Tsomondo avo vanobva kuMhangura vatora baba vavo vaburitswa muchipatara vasina kunyatsopora. VaTshomomndo vanoti hurumende navana mukoti vanofanirwa kuwirirana nekuti varwere vasina mhosva ndivo vanofa. VaMawire vanoti pari zvino havana huwandu hwavana mukoti vari kudzidzira basa vari kuyamura muwadhi yakasanganiswa varwere. Varwere vakawanda vari kuburitswa vasina kupora vari kudzokera kumba uko vanoti vanogona kufa sezvo vasina mari yekuenda kunorapwa nanachiremba vakazvimirira. Vana mukoti vakatanga kukanda mapadza avo pasi nezuro vachiti hurumende yakavanyepera kuti ichagadzirisa zvinhu, asi iyo pasina chayiri kuita. No media source currently available

column2: Human Rights Watch Yokurudzira Kuti Vana Vasashandiswa Mumapurazi eFodya
column3: Zimbabwe iri kukurudzirwa nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reHuman Rights Watch, kuti ichengetedze kodzero dzevana vachiri pasi pezera, avo vari kushandiswa muminda yefodya zvisiri pamwero. Sangano iri raparura gwaro reongororo yarakaita pakushandiswa kwevana vadiki mumapurazi efodya munyika. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vari kushandiswa mumapurazi efodya zvinoita kuti muchetura we ‘nicotine’ upinde muganda ravo uchikonzera zvirwere. VaMavhinga vanoti sangano ravo rayambira hurumende pamusoro pezvirwere izvi uye kuti idzike mitemo yakasimba inobatsira vana ava uye vanhu vakuru vari kushanda vasina kupfeka mbatya dzinodzivirira muchetura uyu. “Pane chirwere chikuru chinobva mukubata fodya, ingava nyoro kana yakaoma, kana paya painopiswa chinonzi muchetura we ‘nicotine’. Kana vana vachishanda mumunda vanenge vachinzwa kupera simba, kuda kurutsa, kusvotwa kana kuita sevane nyongo. Ndizvo zvimwe zviratidzo zvekuti pane chirwere ichocho,” VaMavhinga vakaudza Studio 7. “Takaonazve kuti vana nevabereki nevarimi vefodya vazhinji, vange vasingatozivi dambudziko iroro.” VaMavhinga vanoti vakaita hurukuro nehurumende pamusoro penyaya iyi uye vakavimbiswa kuti hurumende ichaedza kugadzirisa nyaya iyi kutanga nekuisa mitemo yakasimba inochengetedza hutano hwevana. No media source currently available

column2: MDC-T Inoti Zimbabwe Inoda Mari Yakawandisa Kuti Ivandudze Hupfumi
column3: MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai inoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutoda kuti Zimbabwe iwane mari ine chitsama yainopihwa kamwe chete kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimudzirwe zvine mutsindo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChishanu, munyori anowona nezvehupfumi mu MDC-T, Va Webber Chinyadza, vati hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere nepamusana pekutadza kutonga kuri kuita hurumende ye Zanu PF vachiti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutadza kukura kusvika pahwakambosvika muna 1972 nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. No media source currently available Kuti zvinhu zvinakire veruzhinji munyika, Va Chinyadza vati pave kutoda mari ine chitsama inopihwa nyika kuti isimudzire kumutsiridzwa kwemaindaisitiri, nyaya dzekurima, kucherwa kwezvicherwa pamwe nezvimwe zvese zvakabata hupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinyadza vati hurumende haisi kukoshesawo nyaya dzekurima dzinove dzakabata hupfumi vachiti hurumende haisi kuisa mari yakawanda munyaya dzekudiridzira sezvo mamiriro ekunze ari kushanduka. Vati panofanirwa kuiswa mari inoita bhiriyoni rimwe nemazana manomwe ezviuru zvemadhora munyaya dzekurima asi chiri kuvashamisa ndechekuti hurumende yakaisa miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora munyaya dzekudiridzira zvirimwa mumwaka wegore rino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri we Zanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri wenyika vari zvakare mutungamiri we Zanu PF, Va Robert Mugabe, vakaudza nyika neChipiri kuti vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchasimuka kubudikidza nekusimbaradza nyaya dzekurima. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda vakazvimiria, Va Masimba Manyanya, avo vaimbova mukuru aiwona nezvehupfumi mubazi rezvemari, vaudza Studio7 kuti pane zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Nekune rumwe rutivi, gurukota rezvemari, Va Patrick Chinamasa, neChina vakakumbira masangano anokweretesa mari akaita se International Monetary Fund ne World Bank kuti abatsire Zimbabwe nekuikweretesa mari kuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa muhupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe yave nemakore anodarika makore gumi isati yambowana kana kobiri kubva ku World Bank vachiti hurumende iri kushushikana zvikuru nekusapihwa mari kwairi kuitwa nebhanga repasi rose iri. Asi mumiriri we World Bank mu Zimbabwe, Va Guang Zhen Chen, vakaudza Va Chinamasa kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa mitemo yose nezvimwe zvese zviri kutadzisa kuti vekunze vanoda kuzosima mari munyika vauye. Mumiriri weIMF muZimbabwe, VaChristian Beddies, vakaudza Studio7 kutanga kwesvondo rino Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutanga yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvose kuitira kuti ipihwe chikwereti chitsva. Va Manyanya vati chimwe chinoda kugadziriswa inyaya dzematongerwo enyika kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana mari yairi kuda iyi. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti kunze chemari inoita mabhiriyoni masere nezviuru mazana mana emadhora. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kutadza kuri kuita Zimbabwe kubhadhara chikwereti ichi kumasangano anokweretesa mari kuri kuita kuti hurumende isakwanise kupihwa zvimwe zvikwereti zvemiri yairi kuda kusimudzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.

column2: Harare Agricultural Show Inovhurwa Iine Vanhu Vashoma Gore Rino
column3: Zviratidzwa zveHarare Agricultural Show zvatanga nhasi paine kurudziro yekuti varimi pamwe nevemakambani ezvicherwa, havafaniri kupokana asi kuti vanofanira kushanda pamwe chete mukusimudzira mabasa avo nehupfumi hwenyika. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa kuHarare Agricultural Show wazeya kuti varimi nevemakambani ezvicherwa vangashandidzane sei, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima, VaVangelis Peter Haritatos, vati hapafaniri kuve nemakakatamwa pakati pevaviri ava asi kuti vanofanira kushanda pamwe chete. VaHaritatos vatiwo basa rekuchera zvicherwa rinofanira kuitwa pachitevedzwa mitemo yezvekuchengetedza nharaunda vachiti pari zvino pane vamwe vari kungochera pese pese vachiparadza masango nezvimwe zviwanikwa. Mukuru anoona nemabasa ezvemigodhi musangano reChamber of Mines of Zimbabwe, VaDavid Matyanga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyika ine mitemo yakajeka inotaura kuti mabasa ekurima nekuchera zvicherwa anofambiswa sei uye kupoka kuripo kunokonzerwa nekuti mitemo iyi haisi kutevedzwa. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa, VaPolite Kambamura, vatiwo mabasa ekurima pamwe nekuchera zvicherwa akakosha kunyika nekudaro anofanira kudyidzana mukusimbisa hupfumi hwenyika. Vati muzvicherwa munobva zvakawanda zvinoshandiswa pakugadzira zvinhu zvekurimisa nekudaro makambani ezvicherwa anofanira kutsigira mamabasa ekurima zvakasimba. VaKambamura vati zvinofadza kuti pane mamwe makambani ezvicherwa akaita seZimplats ave kutotsigira mabasa ekurima. Mwedzi wapfuura Zimplats yakaisa mamiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica muchirongwa chekuchengeta mombe dzenyama nemukaka munyika yese. Vakambotungamira sangano reConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vati zvakakosha kuti varimi nemakambani ezvicherwa vashande pamwe chete kuitirakuti nyika iwane chikafu chakakwana pamwe nekusimudzira hupfumi. Mukuru weZimbabwe Agricultural Soceity, Dr Andrew Matibiri, vati hurongwa hwavo hwegore rino hwatanga zvakanaka chose. Varimi zana kubva kumativi mana enyika pamwe nemakambani zana nemakumi mashanu nemanomwe ari kuratidzira paShow yegore rino iyo ichavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemusi weChina. Show yegore rino iri kuitwa pachitevedzwa nzira dzekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 uye vakabaiwa nhomba kana kuvhenekwa ndivo chete vari kubvumidzwa kupinda muShow. VaMatibiri vatiwo veruzhinji vanokwanisa kuona zvinenge zvichiitika kuShow pamadandemutande akaita seZoom nemamwe. No media source currently available

column2: Mutasa akapotsa atiny’udza: DeMbare
column3: MWAKA wenhabvu wa2018 uchagara mundangariro dzevatsigiri veDynamos sezvo gore rino chikwata ichi chakapona nepaburi retsono kuburitswa muCastle Premiership League.   Dynamos mwaka uno haina kutamba nhabvu yainozivikanwa ichitamba makore ese izvo zvakaona chikwata ichi chichisvika pakushandura varairidzi kanokwana kana.   Pekutanga, DeMbare yakadzinga Lloyd Mutasa ndokumutsiva naBiggie Zuze asi ndokuzomudzinga zvakare ichidzosa Samaita – sezita raMutasa remadunhurirwa – uye ndokuzomudzinga kechipiri achitsiviwa naLloyd Chigowe.   Zvese izvi mumaziso amaneja wechikwata ichi Richard Chihoro anoti zvakakonzereswa naMutasa uyo waanoti aive nehumbimbindoga asingade kushanda nevamwe kana kuteerera mazano aaipihwa pamusoro pechikwata ichi.   “Munoziva nhabvu haidi humbimbindoga, kuti ndiwe unoziva kudarika vamwe vese! Kwete, hazvidi kudaro.   “Nhabvu inoda mushandirapamwe, kana muchida kuhwina munofanirwa kushanda semhuri. Manje Lloyd aisada izvozvo aingoda kushanda ari ega,  asingateerere vamwe.   “Takapotsa tanyura nekuda kwake kusateerera achifunga kuti ari kugona iye pasina zvaaiita,” anodaro Chihoro.

column2: America Inobatsira Dzimwe Nyika neMushonga weNhomba yeCovid-19
column3: Pamusangano wakaitwa nenyika dzakabudirira dzeG7, nyika idzi dzakazvipira kubatsira dzimwe nyika nenhomba yeCovid-19. Nhomba idzi, pamwe chete nezvakavimbiswa kubva muna Kukadzi 2021, zvichasvitsa rubatsiro rwemushonga rwese urwu pabhirioni remadhora mugore riri kuuya, America ichibatsira nehafu yemushonga iyi. Mugwaro ravakabudisa, vatungamiri venyika dzeG7 vakati chinhu chekutanga chavanoda kuitira dzimwe nyika dzepasi rose kuona kuti mushonga wakanaka uye unoshanda uwanikwe nenyika dziri kubudirira sezvo kubaiwa nhomba kwavanhu vose pasi pano chiri chinhu chakanakira vagari vose pasi pano. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakafara nekuzvipira kwakabvumiranwa uku, zvikurusei sezvo kwakauya mushure mekutaura kwavo kuti America ichatenga mishonga yePfizer/BioNTech inoita zviuru mazana mashanu kuti ipiwe kunyika dzinoita zana. Sekutaura kwakaita VaBiden, America iri kutenga mushonga wekupa dzimwe nyika unopfuura wakambotengwa nenyika ipi zvayo. VaBiden vakati, “Zviuru mazana mashanu zvemushonga wenhomba uyu zvichatanga kuendeswa kunyika dzakasiyana siyana mumwedzi waNyamavhuvhu gore rino. Zviuru mazana maviri zvemushonga uyu zvichaendeswa kuned zimwe nyika gore rino, uye zviuru mazana matatu zvichaendeswa mumwedzi mitanhatu yekutanga mugore ra2022.” Kuzvipira kweAmerica kubatsira dzimwe nyika nemishonga yenhomba yePfizer inoita zviuru mamirioni mazana mashanu kuri kuwedzerwa pamusoro pe mishonga inoita mamirioni makumi masere akavimbiswa dzimwe nyika naVaJoe Biden, avo vakazvipiravo kubatsira nemari inoita mabhirioni maviri emadhora eku America ekubatsira sangano rinobatsira dzimwe nyika mukuwana mushonga wenhomba. Chivimbiso chakaitwa nenyika dzeG7 chinoratidza kuti kubva muna 2020, nyika dzeG7 dzakazvipira kubatsira dzimwe nyika nemabhirioni maviri emushonga wenhomba. Nyika dzeG7 dzakazvipiravo kubatsira dzimwe nyika mukugadzira mushonga wenhomba munyika dzayo dzichishanda neQuad Vaccine Partnership yeAmerica, Australia, India neJapan. VaBiden vanoti zviri pachena kuti nyika dzeG7 dzinobvumirana kuti zvadzakavimbisa izvi hazvisi izvo zvese zvadzichaita, vachiti kubatsira uku kuchaenderera mberi kwenguva yakareba. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Makumi Maviri neZvishanu Vonyoresa kuVhota
column3: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vanyoreswa kuvhota kumatunhu akasiyana siyana kubva zvakaparurwa chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti muna Gunyana hwapfuura zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu. Vatiwo sangano ravo rave mubishi kuunza munyika mimwe michina yose inodiwa kuti vaumbe gwaro idzva revavhoti iri. NeChipiri svondo rinouya, ZEC inenge yopinda mumatunhu akawanda vachinyoresa vavhoti uye nhasi vaparura hurongwa hwekuzivisa vanhu nezvinenge zvoitwa svondo rinouya. Amai Makarau vanoti mukati memavhiki maviri vanenge vave nemuchina wekuvheneka minyoro yemimwe kana kuti mafinger prints kuona kuti hapana munhu anoresa kaviri.

column2: Dare reConstitutional Court Ropa Mutongo Waro neChishanu paChikumbiro chaVaChamisa
column3: Nyaya yekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yatanga kunzwikwa mudare re Constitutional Court. Magweta emutungamiri we MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, aswera achikweshana pfungwa nemagweta ari kumirira mutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Achisvitsa humboo mudare, magweta aVaChamisa achitungamirwa naAdvocate Thabani Mpofu, ati zviri pachena kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakavhota nevakanyoresa kuvhota hazvisi kupindirana. Magweta aya aroverera Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, nyaya yekuti yakatadza kubata zvakanaka sarudzo, uye pane dzimwe nguva, yakaisa mavhoti aifanirwa kupihwa VaChamisa kuna VaMnangagwa. Ukuwo magweta aVaMnangagwa achitungamirwa naVaItai Uriri, audza dare kuti hapana humboo huri mudare hunoratidza kuti Zec yakaisa mavhoti kuna VaMnangagwa. Magweta aya atiwo humboo huri kupihwa nemagweta aVaChamisa hauna kodzero yekunge huchibvumidzwa kupinda mudare. VaUriri vatiwo magwaro akapihwa VaMnangagwa akasvika kwavari nguva yakatarwa nemutemo yapfuura. Asi magweta aVaChamisa ati paakaisa magwaro awo mudare akasangana nedambudziko sezvo chikonzi chisina kuita basa racho remazvo. Vati sezvo dare richivharwa na 4 dzemasikati, havana kukwanisa kuwana rubatsiro rwematare kuitira kuti magwaro asvike nenguva kwayo. Asi VaUriri varamba vakasimba nerekuti mutemo unoti magwaro aya anofanirwa kusvitswa kumunhu aendeswa kumatare mukati memazuva manomwe, uye mazuva manomwe aya hapana pakanzi mazuva ezororo nekupera kwesvondo haaverengwe pamazuva manomwe akatarwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Vati dare rinofanirwa kuona kuti mazuva anotarwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika munyaya dzekupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika atevedzwa pakatariswa zvinoreva bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Gweta re Zec, VaTawanda Kanengoni, vati hapana huchapupu hunoratidza kuti pane nhamba dzevanhu vakavhota vakaiswa pavanhu vakavhotera VaMnangagwa. Vatiwo huwandu hwezvakakanganiswa neZec hauna kukura zvekuti hungachinja danho rakatorwa neZec rekuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo iyi. Mukuru wevatongi vematare, VaLuke Malaba, vati dare richapa mutongo waro neChishanu. No media source currently available

column2: Kuda okunga zvibhakera
column3: SHASHA yetsiva yechidzimai yeWorld Boxing Council (WBC) Interim Title – Kudakwashe Memory “Take Money” Chiwandire – atanga gadziriro dzake svondo rino dzekuzosangana naYamileth Mercado wekuMexico.   Vatambi vaviri ava vacharwira bhande rina Mercado reWBC Gold mumutambo uchiri pakati pekurongwa.   Kutaura kuno, chikwata chaTake Money naMercado zvakamirira kupihwa gwaro neWBC kuti vachitanga kuita hurukuro dzekuronga mutambo uyu.   Murairidzi waTake Money arizve maneja wake, Clyde Musonda, anoti chikwata chavo chakamirira kunzwa kubva kuWBC kuti vochitanga rinhi kuita hurukuro nechikwata chaMercado.   Anoti apo vakamirira gwaro iri, vakatotanga kuita gadziriro dzemutambo uyu sezvo vari kuda kuti Take Money agare akagadzirira.   “Take Money akatanga gadziriro dzake svondo rino takatarisana nemutambo waMercado, kunyangwe zvazvo tichakamirira kunzwa kubva kuWBC nekuti ndivo vanotipa mvumo yekuti chitangai kuita hurukuro mushure mekuita ongororo yavo.   “Isu tiri kuda kugara takagadzirira nekuti patichasangana naMercado, Take Money anenge asiri kumirira Zimbabwe chete, asi Africa yose. Saka tinoda kutorera Mercado bhande rake riuye kuno,” anodaro Musonda.   Anoti kana hurukuro dzekuronga mutambo uyu dzikatanga, shuviro yavo ndeyekuti uitwe gore rinotevera munaKukadzi kana Kurume.   Musonda anoti murwendo rwekugadzirira mutambo uyu, vachaenda kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neNamibia kunoita gadziriro sezvo mutambo wavatarisana nawo uri mukuru.   “Sezvo mutambo wedu wekupedzisira apo takarwa naZulina Munoz waive uri munaGumiguru, tinoda kuti unotevera Kudah agorwa naMercado munaKukadzi kana Kurume.   “Asi, hunge hurukuro dzedu nechikwata chake dzikafamba zvakanaka.   “Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro, tichaenda naKudah kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neNamibia tichinosimbaradza gadziriro dzake dzemutambo uyu nekuti nyika idzi dzine magym etsiva ane zvinhu zvose zvakakwana anobatsira kuti gadziriro dzedu dzifambe zvakanaka,” anodaro Musonda.

column2: MDC Inoti Kuratidzira Kwayo Kuri Kuenderera Mberi neMusi weChishanu
column3: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inoti iri kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo hwekuratidzira nemusi weChishanu, kunyange hazvo isati yanzwa kubva kumapurisa. MDC yakazivisa mapurisa svondo rapera kuti ichapinda mukuratidzira uku sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika. Asi bato iri rinoti kusapindura kwemapurisa hakusi kuzotadzisa hurongwa hwekuratidzira uhu, sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika ichiripa kodzero yekuratidzira. MDC inoti iri kuratidzira sezvo isiri kufara nehutongi hwemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo bato iri rinoti haricherechedzi kusarudzwa kwavakaitwa gore rapera. Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika, reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, rakazivisa gore rapera kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakanga vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. Asi MDC yakapikisa izvi mudare reConstitutional Court, iro rakapa mutongo waitambira zvakanga zvaziviswa musarudzo dzegore rapera nasachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba. Asi MDC inoti VaMnangagwa vari kutadza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, izvo zviri kupa kuti nyika ishaye magetsi, mafuta edzimotokari, uye kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu mazuva ose. Murongi wemisangano muMDC, VaAmos Chibaya, vanoti kuratidzira kwavo kuchaitwa murunyararo sezvo vagara vari bato rinoremekedza mitemo yenyika. VaChibaya vanoti zvisineyi kuti havasati vawana mhinduro kubva kumapurisa, kuratidzira kwavo kuri kuenderera mberi nemusi weChishanu. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti MDC inogara yakati ichaita ratidziro murunyararo asi ichizopedzisira yaita mhirizhonga. VaMutodi vanotiwo sebato reZanu PF riri kutonga, vari kuzviziva kuti MDC iri kuratidzira kuitira kuti VaMnangagwa vabviswe pachigaro. “Vakuru vari kuti vachange vari mberi mekuratidzira uku ndinovayambira kuti vasazoyeuka bako vanaiwa,” vadaro VaMutodi. Asi VaChibaya vanoti vari kuzviziva kuti Zanu PF iri kugadzira zvipfeko zveMDC zvichapihwa vanhu kuti vazovhiringa kuratidzira kwakarongwa nebato ravo. Senzira yekuti izvi zvisaitike, VaChibaya vanoti vachange vaine nhengo dzebato ravo dzichachengetedza runyararo, uye pakaita nhubu dzinoda kukonzera mhirizhonga, vachadzibata vachidziisa mumaoko emapurisa. Muna Ndira, sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakadaidzira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo kwemazuva matatu. Asi vanhu vakapinda mumigwagwa iyi vachiratidzira. Kuratidzira uku kwakapedzisira kwaita mhirizhonga iyo yakaona vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri vachifa mushure mekupfurwa nemabara epfuti. Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti pamhirizhonga yakaitika muna Ndira, pane vanhu makumi matanhatu nevasere vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti, uye vanhu vanodarika zana vaive nemaronda airatidza kuti akakonzerwa nesimbi nezvimwe zvombo zvinocheka. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti mumazuva matatu akadaidzirwa neZCTU kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo, vakaona mapurisa achishandisa zvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza pavanhu vairatidzira vasina zvombo, uye vakaonawo masoja aive nepfuti dzemhando yeAK-47. column2: Madhokotera neVakoti Votanga Kuramwa Mabasa neKushaya Zvekuzvidzivirira kuCoronavirus
column3: Vanachiremba navana mukoti munyika vatanga kuramwa mabasa kunyangwe nyika yatarisana nechirwere chouraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose cheCoronavirus. Vanachiremba navanamukoti ava vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kuvapa zvekushandisa kuti vazvidzivire kutapurirwa zvirwere zvakaita seCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano, iri mumaoko eStudio 7, vanamukoti kuburikidza nesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association vati vakasuma bazi rezvehutano mazuva maviri apfuura kut vanoda zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCoronavirus, mvura muzvipatara uye mari yekushanda kwavachaita nguva yakareba vachirapa vane chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano nevakuru vezvipatara zvehurumende munyika, mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Tawanda Zvakada, vatiwo nhengo dzavo hadzichakwanise kuramba dzichishanda kutanga nhasi sezvo dzisina zvekuzvidzivirira. Vati vakaita musangano nehurumende neMuvhuro nezvenyaya iyi asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chabuda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kana munyori mubazi ravo, Dr Agnes Mahomva, sezvo vose vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Kusvika pari zvino hurumende inoti vanhu vatatu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus munyika uye mumwe chete, mutori wenhau, Zororo Makamba, akashaya vakavigwa neChipiri. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vatenda kuti vanoda zvikwanisiro muzvipatara nechimbi chimbi uye vakanda mapadza pasi.. No media source currently available

column2: Vatambi baiwai nhomba: SRC
column3: SANGANO reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) riri kukurudzira vatambi vemitambo yakasiyana kuti vabaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti zvigobatsira mukuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi pamwe nekudzoswa kwemitambo nekuchimbidza.   Mitambo yose pari zvino yakambomiswa nekuda kweCovid-19 kunze kweyezvikwata zvenyika chete inosanganisira yeZimbabwe Cricket apo maChevrons ari kubandana neBangladesh mumitambo yeOne Day International, Twenty20 Series neTest match series.   Muchinyorwa, akafanobata chigaro chadirector-general weSRC – Sebastain Garikai – anoti zvakakosha kuti vatambi vose vaibaiwe majekiseni ekudzivirira Covid-19.   “Kunyanzvi dzemitambo zvakakosha kuti tikoshese chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 sezviri kuitwa neveruzhinji nekuti zvinobatsira mukuderedza kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Kana chirwere ichi chikarwiswa, zvinobatsira zvakare pane zvatiri kuedza kuita mukudzosa mitambo yose, ichidzoka iine vatsigiri asi vari vashoma,” anodaro Garikai.   Anoenderera mberi achiti, “Tichitarisana nekumiswa kwemitambo yeChibuku Super Cup, zvakaratidza kukosha kwekubaiwa majekiseni eCovid-19 nekuti zvikwata zvaive nevanhu vakawanda vakabatwa neCovid-19 ndizvo zvaive nevashomawo vakabaiwa.”   Garikai anoti pari zvino SRC pamwe nemasangano akasiyana vari kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita zvinhu munyika maringe nedenda iri.   “Tiri kuongorora zvose zvinenge zvichiitika kuti todzosa sei mitambo, naizvozvo tichange tichiongorora svondo rega-rega tichiita hurukuro negurukota revechidiki nerezveutano nekurerwa kwevana,” anodaro.   Garikai anoti pari zvino mitambo yenhabvu haikwanisike kuti idzoke asi hunge kana zvikwata zvemuPSL zvikatevedzera chirongwa chebio-secure bubble izvo zvinoreva kuti vatambi venhabvu, hutungamiri hwemutambo uyu nevaridzi vepembe vanenge vachigara pavo voga kusina veruzhinji.   “Nhabvu pari zvino inogona kudzoka chete kana chirongwa chebio-secure bubble chiri kutevedzerwa izvo zvinoona vatambi venhabvu, vatungamiri vezvikwata nevaridzi vepembe vose vachigara pamwe chete vasingasange neruzhinji. Izvi ndizvo zviri kuitwa nevecricket nerugby, ndiko kusaka mitambo yavo iri kutenderwa kutambwa.   “Tose tinoda kuona kukasika kudzoka kwemitambo. Asi kudzoka kwayo kunofanirwa kunge kuchienderana nesainzi, mitemo yeWorld Health Organization (WHO) nemitemo yeHurumende,” anodaro.

column2: ‘TSIGIRAI LOGA’
column3: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vanoti hapana chinokonesa Zimbabwe kuenda kumakwikwi e2022 Qatar World Cup zvichitevera kugadzwa kwemurairidzi mutsva wechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors, Zdravko Logarusic.   Loga, sezita remadunhurirwa raLogarusic iro raakapihwa nevatsigiri venhabvu, akagadzwa pachigaro chinopisa ichi neZifa achitsiva Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa uyo akasiya basa gore rapera.   Joey ‘Mafero’ Antipas ndiye ange akafanobata chigaro ichi zvichitevera kubva kwaMhofu.   Chizvarwa chekuCroatia ichi, Loga, akaparurwa zviri pamutemo svondo radarika nesangano reZifa.   Mutungamiri weZifa, Felton Kamambo, akabva azivisa Loga kuti maWarriors anofanirwa kuenda kumakwikwi ese enhabvu anoti African Nations Cup (CHAN), Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) 2021 neFifa World Cup 2022.   Muhurukuro nevatsigiri venhabvu vakasiyana vanoti remangwana remaWarriors rakajeka zvikuru zvichitevera kugadzwa kwakaitwa Loga.   Mutungamiri wesangano reFriends of Warriors, Edward Chimedza, anoti kuuya kwaLoga kwaunza chiedza chakanaka uye pane tarisiro huru yekuti achabata basa sebasa.   “Loga auya, tinofanirwa kumupa nguva anyatsobika chikwata chake uye Zifa ngaimutsigire nekumupa zvese zvaanoda kuti agoita basa rake nemazvo. Tine mukana wekuita zvikuru munhabvu naLoga uye tiri kumutemba kuti achabata basa, 2022 ndaona tichienda kuWorld Cup naye. Asi anofanirwa kutanga atidzosera kuAfcon zvekare,” anodaro Chimedza.   Mashoko ake anotsinhirwa neshasha inozivikanwa pakutsigira nhabvu, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa achiti Loga anofanirwa kuwana rutsigiro ruzere kubva kuZifa, mapoka akasiyana anoona nezvenhabvu pamwechete nevatsigiri.   “Murairidzi wedu mutsva tinaye uye tiri kufamba naye, toda kumuona achibudirira. Anofanirwa kupihwa rutsigiro rwese rwaanoda kuti agobudirira mubasa rake. Kana akataura kuti ane vatambi vaanoda, ngavauye nenguva kuitira kuti ashande navo agozivana navo.   “Tine mitambo mikuru iri kuuya saka tinoziva kuti tikamutsigira zvakasimba tinobudirira chete, kunyanya mumutambo weCHAN uri kuuya munaKubvumbi. Asi mikuru yeAfcon neWorld Cup yatiri kuda ndine chivimbo chekuti ari kuzotiendesa,” anodaro.   Munyori mukuru weFriends of the Warriors, Zivanai Muwashu anoti kuve nemurairidzi wekunze kunobatsira zvikuru mune zvakasiyana.   “Uku ndiko kubudirira kwatave kuita munhabvu yedu, tave kufamba mugwara chairo naLoga. Tine varairidzi vemuno hapana kwataienda nekuti vamwe vaisarudza vatambi vekuzvikwata zvavo kuti vagouya kumaWarriors, manje naLoga achanyatsoongorora vese osarudza vatambi vaanoda avo vaanoona kuti ndivo vanokodzera kutambira maWarriors.   “ Mumaonero angu, izvi zvichatibatsira kuti vatambi vanogona vachashevedzwa uye vachatamba nhabvu votisvitsa kure,” anodaro Muwashu. Mutambo wekutanga waLoga achirairidza maWarriors uriko musi wa23 Kurume apo achasangana neAlgeria, kuAlgeria mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuAfcon 2021.   Svondo rinotevera racho, maWarriors achange ari pamusha apo achasangana neAlgeria mumutambo weAfcon zvakare.   MunaKubvumbi, Loga ane basa guru rekubata sezvo achatungamirira maWarriors kumakwikwi eCHAN achaitirwa kuCameroon.   MaWarriors akaiswa muboka reGroup A rine zvikwata zvinoti Cameroon, Burkina Faso neMali.

column2: Basketball yogeda-geda
column3: MURAIRIDZI wechikwata chebasketball cheJBC Basketball Club — Addison Chiware — anoti vatambi vakawanda vemutambo uyu vanoda kuziva remangwana ravo zvichitevera kumiswa kwakaitwa mitambo yose gore rapera senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Chiware, uyo akamborairidza chikwata chenyika chebasketball, anoti Covid-19 yakavhiringidza zvakawanda mumutambo uyu zvekuti havachazive kuti vodii kuti udzoswe.   “Vatambi vedu vazhinji vave nemibvunzo yakawanda zvikuru, vanoda kuziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei uye zvichafambiswa sei kuti mutambo uyu udzoswe.   “Vatambi vaitoraramiswa nemutambo uyu uye vamwe vaitoushandisa kuti vagokwanisa kuwana mikana yekuenda kunze kwenyika saka kana usingatambwe mukana wekutengwa nezvikwata zvekunze hapatorina.   “Covid-19 iyi yavhiringa zvakawanda. Saka isu tave kungomirira kuti zvinhu zvinake chete.   “Ndiyo nzira yega inoita kuti zvitifambire uye mutambo uyu udzoke pasina chinokanganisa,” anodaro Chiware.   Gore radarika rave kunopera, zvikwata zvebasketball zvakasiyana zvakange zvave kutanga kuita gadziriro paine tarisiro yekuti mutambo uyu waigona kuzodzoswa asi zvose zvakaenda mudondo nekuda kwekunyuka zvakare kweCovid-19.   “Pane patakambotanga kugadzirira tikafunga kuti zvave kuendeka manje asi takabva tadzoserwa shure neCovid-19 yakatanga kunyuka zvekare.   “Izvezvi kana mutambo uyu ukanzi wadzoka zvichatitorera nguva sezvo vatambi vave nenguva huru vasingatambe,” anodaro Chiware.

column2: VeMuzvitoro Voramba Kutambira Makadhi ekuBhanga
column3: Veruzhinji muHarare vanoti havasi kufara nezvave kuitwa nevezvimwe zvitoro zvekunzi vatenge nemari chaiyo pakutenga zvimwe zvinhu kwetese kushandisa makadhi ekubhanga. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinonzi zvakumanikidza vatengi kuti vashandise mari kutenga zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita semafuta kwete kushandisa makadhi ekubhanga kana dzimwe nzira dzakaita seEcocash. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Takudzwa Dzumbunu vati dambudziko iri rafararira nezvitoro zvakawanda zvavanoti zviri kukonzera kuti vashaye zvekuita sezvo vanhu vazhinji vanga vorarama nekushandisa makadhi ekubhanga kana kubhadhara neEcocash sezvo mari dziri kushyaikwa kumabhanga. Asi Amai Winnet Bhasera vanoti ivo semunhu ave pamudyandigere zviri kuvawomera kuti vanzi vasashandise makadhi ekubhanga pakutenga zvimwe zvinhu muzvitoro vachiti havakwanise kuswera vakamira pamitsetse yekumbhanga kuti vakwanise kuwanisa mari yekutenga zvavanenge vachida. Asi Muzvare Kudzai Chaparadza vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo iri riri dambudziko kuvatengi, vezvitoro vanenge vachidawo kubhadhara vashandi nemari yacho saka zvakakoshawo kuti veruzhinji vashandise musvo wemari pakutenga. Vaenderera mberi vachiti makambani anogadzira zvinhu akaita semafuta anodawo mari yekutenga kubva kunze kwenyika zvaanoshandisa mukugadzira zvinhu. Vamwe vakuru munezvimwe zvitoro zvashanyirwa neStudio 7 varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti havabvumidzwe kutaura pamhepo nevakuru vavo. Kunyangwe hazvo varamba kutaura, zvinyorwa zvanga zvakanamatidzwa muzvitoro izvi zvanga zvichiti vanhu vanofanira kutenga nemari chaiyo kwete makadhi sezvo kwavanohodha kuchidiwa musvo wemari. Umwe mushandi pane imwe kambani inogadzira mafuta iri muHarare uyo aramba kudomwa nezita ati imwe yemichina yavanoshandisa pakusvina mafuta inoda kutengerwa zvinhu kana kuti ma parts kubva kunze kwenyika saka zviri kuvatorera nguva yakareba kuti vawane mvumo yekuburitsa mari iyi kubva kubhanga guru renyika reRBZ. Kubva pakatanga kunetsa kushayikwa mari kumabhanga, RBZ yakabva yatora danho rekuti vese vanoda kutenga zvinhu kunze vanofanira kutanga vapihwa mvumo neRBZ. Zvichakadai, tsvangiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 yaburitsa pachena kuti zvimwe zviteshi zvinotengesa mafuta edzimotokari zvavekuti munhu awedzere imwe mari pamusoro kana achishandisa kadhi rekubhanga pakutenga mafuta emotokari. Vashandi pane chimwe chiteshi chepeturu chiri pakati pedhorobha vati chikonzero chiri kuita kuti vaite izvi ndechekuti vanobatirwa mari kubhanga kana voda kutora mari iyi zvavati zvinoita kuti varuze mari yakawanda kana vasingawedzere mari shomanana pamusoro pemari yakatarwa kuti vatengese nayo mafuta edzimotokari. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevasangano rinomirira vatengi reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

column2: Vakawanda Vane Varwere paParirenyatwa Voswerapo Nekuda kweKuoma kweZvinhu
column3: Kuwondomoka kwehupfumi munyika kowedzera kutambudzika kwehama dzine varwere muzvipatara zvakadai seParirenyatwa, uko vanachiremba vasiri kuenda kumabasa. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 pachipatara cheParirenyatwa inoratidza kuti veruzhinji vanorwarirwa vari kuswera vari pachipatara ichi vakamirira kuona varwere panguva dzakeona varwere, vachiti zvinhu zvakavaomera kuti vange vachimbodzokera kudzimba vozodzokazve sezvo mari dzekufambisa mumichovha dzakakwidzwa zvakanyanya. Mumwe wevanhu vanoswera pachipatara ichi ndemumwe mudzimai uyo angoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Mai Miranzi. Amai Miranzi, avo vane mukoma wavo ari muchipatara, vanoti kana vangouya panguva dzekushanyira murwere dza 6 dzemangwanani, vanozobva pachipatara apa mushure mekuona murwere nenguva dza 6 dzemanheru. Amai Miranzi vanoti vanoswera nenzara. Amai Miranzi vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo vari vanhu vabva zera, vanotofamba netsoka kubva mudhorobha mavanenge vaburukira kuenda kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa. Amai Rumbidzai Shumba vane murwerewo zvakare muParirenyatwa. Amai Shumba vanotsigirawo zvataurwa naAmai Miranzi vachiti kudhura kwemari dzekufambisa ndiko kunovapa kuti vangoswera havo pachipatara apa. Kunyangwe hazvo vane varwere ava vachiswera pachipatara apa, vanotiwo kusavapo kwanachiremba kunowedzera matambudziko avo sezvo hama dzavo dzisiri kurapwa uye vachingowana pasina shanduko. Vanachiremba havasi kuenda kumabasa vachiti havasisina zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaende kumabasa avo. Vamwewo amai vada kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Kukuwe vati zvinosuwisa kuti zvavanenge vangosiya varwere vavo vari ndizvo zvavanowana vari. Vemachechi pasi pemubatanidzwa weZimbabwe Christian Heads of Denominations vanotiwo vakanyora gwaro kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachitaridza kushushikana zvikuru nekurambodzikira kwezvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. Vachitaura neStudio 7, Reverend Kenneth Mtata veZimbabwe Council of Churches vanoti vemakereke vanoona sekuti kuramboderera kwehupfumi kunokonzera kusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyika. Ukuwo, dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kushaya simba kwemari yemunyika ichienzaniswa nedhora rekuAmerica pamwe nekudhura kwemitengo yezvinodiwa nemunhu zuva rega rega zvave kusiya mhuri zhinji dzichinyura kupinda muhurombo. column2: Mapurisa Orova Madzibaba VeShanduko, Uko Zanu-PF Ichinzi Yoshungurudza veCCC
column3: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rinoti munyika maberekera ingwe zvichitevera kushungurudzwa kuri kuita nhengo dzaro kwasara vhiki rimwe chete kuti nyika iende kusarudzo. Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights raburitsa padandemutande raro reTwitter kuti VaGodfrey Chidhawu Karembera nhengo yebato reCitizens Coalition for Change (CCC) vanozivikanwa nekuti Madzibaba veShanduko varohwa vari mumaoko emapurisa kukamba yeHarare Central. ZLHR inotiwo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekusazvibata zvakanaka paruzhinji vachinzi vanga vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vavhotere VaNelson Chamisa veCCC. Bazi rezvekubuditswa kwemashoko ratiwo padandemutande retwitwer pari kuitwa tsvakurudzo nezvenyaya yekusabatwa zvakanaka kwaVakarembera vari mumaoko emapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa ari kuongorora nyaya yekuti VaKarembera varohwa vari mumaoko emapurisa uye imwe nyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vange vachitsvaga rutsigiro zvisina mvumo yemapurisa nekunzwiwo vatuka mapurisa pavange vachida kusungwa. Mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vatiwoimwe nhengo yavo Amai Thokozile Dube varikuda kutsvaka chigaro chehukanzura kuUmzingwane ward 20 avkarara vachishungurudzwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF. Mune imwewo nyaya, Bato reZanu PF rinoti rinoda kukunda sarudzo zvakachena uye ishuviro yavo kuti mapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika akwanise kutsvaka rutsigiro murunyararo. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare, vanoona nezvematongerwo enyika mubato reZanu PF, VaMike Bimha vati bato reZanu PF rinoda kuti mapato ese avachakwikwidzana nawo musarudzo vatsvake rutsigiro vakasununguka huye kusina mhirizhonga. VaBimha vakakurudzira mapurisa kuti aite basa nemazvo mukuferefeta nyaya dzine chekuita nemhirizhonga. Vatiwo bato reZanu PF ririkushandisa sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa munaKurume sechiyero kuona kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zviri kutsigirwa here. Vaenderera mberi vachiti bato ravo ratotangawo kupa ruzivo kune avo vachange vari panzvimbo dzekuvhoterwa kana kuti mapolling agents. Asi Muzvare Mahere vati muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo Zanu-PF ichingotaura chete kuti haidi mhirizhonga asi nekune rimwe divi ichiipesvedzera. Nyanzvi munezvematongerwo enyika VaSydicks Muradzikwa vatiwo mamwe mapato munyika haasi kupiwa mukana wekutsvaka rutsigiro. Sarudzo dzemaby-elections dzirikutarisirwa kuitwa musi wa26 Kurume.

column2: Vanhu Vobvumidzwa Kupinza Munyika Pachena Zvinhu Zvine Mutengo we$200 Chete
column3: Asi zvinenge zvapfurikidza pamazana maviri emadhora aya zvichizochajwa mutero wezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, kana kuti 40%. Kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika munyaya dzezveupfumi kunonzi kuri kupa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvirambe zvichipinza munyika zvekudya nezvimwe zvekushandisa zuva nezuva kubva kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBotswana. Izvi zvinoitika kunyange hazvo paine mutemo weStatutory Instrument 64, uyo unorambidza kupinzwa kwezvinhu zvine huwandu munyika. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, reIntrenational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vanoti kunyange hazvo paine mutemo uyu, vashandi veZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra, vari pamuganhu weBeitbridge vane zvimwe zvavari kubvumidza kupinzwa munyika. VaJuru vanoti zvinhu zvinokosha madhora mazana maviri chete pamunhu, ndizvo zvinobvumidzwa kupinda munyika pasina mutero. Asi zvinenge zvapfurikidza pamazana maviri emadhora aya zvichizochajwa mutero wezvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana, kana kuti 40 %. Asi VaJuru vanoti zvinhu zvakaita sezvekuvakisa, mabhara nezvimwe zvihombe hazvisi kubvumidzwa munyika pasi pemutemo weSI 64 uyu. Vanotiwo mitsetse yevanhu vanoda kupinda muZimbabwe pabhodha reBeitbridge, zvikuru kudivi reSouth Africa, hapachina sezvo South Africa yakawedzera vashandi. Asi vanoti vari kufamba vari kusangana nematambudziko ekukwidzwa kwemari dzekubhadhara kumabhazi, vachiti semuenzaniso, kubva ku Johannesburg kunosvika kuHarare vanhu vari kubhadhariswa mari inosvika marhandi mazana masere.
