column2: Vatsigiri vemaWarriors Vofara neGadziriro yeMakwikwi eAfrica Nations Cup
column3: Chikwata chemaWarriors chiri kuratiza kuti chiri munzira yakajeka apo chakananga kumakwikwi e2017 Africa Cup of Nations. Chikwata ichi nezuro chakadambura maTaifa Stars ekuTanzania 3-0 mumutambo wekuenzana masimba, izvo zvirikugutsa veruzhinji kuti maWarriors achanokwikwidza zvine mutsindo kuAFCON. Vanhu havana kuuya kunhandare sezvaitarisirwa asi vashoma vacho vaivemo vakanakidzwa nematambiro echikwata chavo icho chakawana zvibodzwa kubva kuna Knowledge Musona, Nyasha Mushekwi pamwe naMathew Rusike. Zvakabuda pamutabo uyu zvakakosha kumaWarriors kwete mugadziriro yavo yeNations Cup chete asi muma Fifa World rankings zvekare sezvo veFifa vanoshandisa mitambo yakadai kugadzira mamiriro ezvikwata muhurongwa hwepasi rese. Mutsigiri weDynamos VaObert Masvotore vanoti zvakaitika neTanzania zvinobatsira kutyisidzira zvikwata zvanga zvichitarisira Zimbabwe pasi kuma Africa Cup of Nations vachiwedzera ivo kuti ikozvino Zimbabwe iri kuenda kuGabon iinechiremera. Aimbotambira maWarriors neCaps United Alois Bunjira anoti kukunda kwemaWarriors zvinhu zvinofadza zvikuru achiti ivo semaonero ake tarenda rakazara muchikwata chenyika ichi. Mutsigiri weCaps United VaShingirai Mthombeni varikudada nemaitiro emaWarriors vachiti ivo dai varamba vakadai kusvikira pachapera maAfrica Cup of Nations finals. Mutambo weTanzania wauya svondo rimwechete maWarriors achangobva kukunda Zambia 1-0. Asi Bunjira anoti pachine zviviri kana zvitatu zvinoda kugadziriswa maWarriors asati ave kurota zvekutora mukombe wemuAfrica. Pamusoro pevatambi vakabva kunze kwenyika, murairidzi wemaWarriors Kalisto Pasuwa akashandisawo vatambi vanotambira zvikwata zvemuno vakaita saHardlife Zvirekwi weCaps United, Teenage Hadebe weChicken Inn pamwe na Tatenda Mukuruva weDynamos, avo arikuongorora kuti angaende navo here kuma fainari. Pasuwa anoti ari kuda mimwe mitambo miviri kana mitatu yekuedzana masimba kuti akwanise kugadzira chikwata chakasimba icho achaenda nacho kuGabon. Mutungamiri weZifa VaPhillip Chiyangwa vakavimbisa mitambo nezvikwata zvine mukurumbira muAfrica zvakaita seEgypt neIvory Coast maWarriors asati asimuka kuenda kumaAfrica Cup of Nations. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vanoti zveZIFA kutenda maruva wadya chakata.

column2: Hurukuro dzeRunyararo Pakati peRussia neUkraine Dzotarisirwa Kutangazve muTurkey
column3: Nhaurirano dzeRusssia neUkraine dziri kutarisirwa kutanga svondo rino muTurkey apo hondo pakati penyika mbiri idzi yapinda musvondo rechishanu. Mutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodomyr Zelenskyy vanoti rusungunuko rwenyika yavo yose rwakakosha munhaurirano idzi vachiramba zviri kutaurwa neRussia kuti itore mamwe matunhu enyika yavo. Mutungamiri wenyika yeTurkey VaRecep Tayyip Erdogan vakatotaura parunhare memutungamiri weRussia VaVladimir Putin vachikurudzira kuti vambokanda zvombo pasi. United Nations inoti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vamanikidzwa kuenda muhupoterei muUkraine nekuda kwehondo iyi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica VaAntony Blinken vakadzokorora zvakare kuti nyika yavo haisikuda kupidigura hurumende yeRussia mushre mekunge mutungamiti wenyika VaJoe Biden vati VaPutin havafanire kuramba vari pachigaro zvichitevera kurwisa kwavari kuita Ukraine. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Mashocha vari muAmerica vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona Russia ichibvuma kuita nhaurirano dzekupedza hondo sezvo zvirango zvakaomarara zvayakatemerwa zvichigona kukanganisa hupfumi hwavo zvakanyanya. column2: Vanhu Vanoda Kusvika Mamiriyoni Zana Vange Vatovhota Musarudzo dzemuAmerica Vakawanda neKutya Covid-19
column3: Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu kana kuti 96 million vakatovhota kare musarudzo dzemuAmerica sezvo matunhu akawanda achibvumidza kuti vanhu vavhote vachiita zvekutumira vhoti yavo kana kuti mail in ballot kuitira kurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kune vamwe vakaita semauto vanenge vari kunze kenyika. Vamwe vanokwanisawo kukurumidza kunovhota zuva rakatarwa risati rasvika. Musi wa 3 Mbudzi kana kwapera makore mana ndiwo zuva rekuvhota riri pamutemo. Mumwe wevakatovhota kare musarudzo idzi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muMaryland VaTaka Kapikinyu vanoti mushure mekuvhota vakaziviswa kuti vhoti yavo yainge yatambirwa yangomirirwa kuitwa. No media source currently available Vari kwikwidzana gore rino mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump vebato remaRepublicans uye VaJoe Biden vebato remaDemocrats. Kunze kwekuti ndiyani achange otungamira nyika yeAmerica, pane dzimwe sarudzo dzakakosha zvikuru mumatongerwo enyika dzinova dzedare reSenate. Parizvino bato remaRepublicans ndiro rine nhengo dzakawanda dzinosvika makumi mashanu nematatu kana kuti 53. MaDemocrats ane nhengo makumi mana nenomwe kana kuti 47. Rwendo rwuno matunhu makumi matatu nemashanu ndiwo ari kuita sarudzo dzesenate sezvo dzisingaitwe panguva imwechete. Asi kana mapato maviri aya akakwanisa ose kuwana zvigaro makumi mashanu kana kuti 50-50 zvinoreva kuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika ndiye anenge aine vhoti yakakosha nekudaro ndokusaka paine makwikwi akasimba pakati paVaTrump naVaBiden. Rimwe dunhu rakakosha musarudzo idzi ndereNorth Carolina. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mudunhu iri VaEsau Mavindidze vanova zvekare mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica, reZimbabwe Diaspora Network North America vanoti kunyangwe dunhu ravo rakarerekera kumaDemocrats rwendo rwuno, zviri kuratidza kuti pane makwikwi akasimba pakati paVaBiden naVaTrump. column2: Highlanders Yopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mapfumbamwe
column3: Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. Vatsigiri venhabvu vatarisana nemabiko anofadza mukupera kwesvondo. Kubva kumitambo yemuAfrica kusvika kumakwikwi eZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge, kuchave nemachikichori enhabvu ayo anga achingotaurwa nezvawo svondo rese. Pamusoro pezvo kuchave nemabiko ekupembera kusvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe kwechikwata cheHighlanders uko mukuru wacho, VaNadumiso Gumede, vakavimbisa mumimhanzi pamwe nenhabvu zvepamusoro soro muBarbourfields Stadium neMugovera. No media source currently available Asi mutambo uri pamuromo pevazhinji ndeuyo uri kuSouth Africa apo chikwata cheChicken Inn chiri kutarisira kudimbura muswe chikwata chemaBrazilains icho chiri kuparadza zvimwe zvikwata. Mutambi ane mukurmbira muZimbabwe, asi achitambira Memelodi Sundowns, Khama Billiart, achenge ari mumutambo uyu kunyange hazvo asina kupinda mune wekutanga nekukuvara. Chicken Inn yakakuanda 1-0 mumutambo iwoyu asi muteveri wenhabvu, VaLesvison Ndudzi, vanoti ikozvino maGamecocks anofanira kungwarira Billiart Vachitarisa matambiro akaita maGamecocks mumutambo wekutanga, muongorori wezvemitambo ane mukurumbira, VaAndrew Rwodzi, vanoti havasi kunyanyotyira Chicken Inn. Vatsigiri vechikwata cheHighlanders vanogara muSouth Africa vanosvika zviuru zviviri vavimbisa kuti vachange vari munhandare vachikuzirira Chicken Inn. Chimwe chikwata chemuZimbabwe cheHarare City chiri kuMadagascar uko chiri kusangana neAS Adema kwete muCaf Champions League, asi muCaf Confederation Cup. Harare City iri kutingamira 3-2 kubva mumutambo wekutanga zvekuti murairidzi wechikwata ichi, Taurai Mangwiro, anoti haasi kuona vachinetseka kukunda mumutambo wechipiri uyu. Mutambo wekugumisira uchange uri muRufaro Stadium umo Dynamos iri kusangana neZPC Kariba mumutambo wekota fainari yeZimbabwe National Army Charity Challenge. Kunyange hazvo mune manyukunyuku muchikwata ichi, chikwata ichi change chichingotamba mumutambo wehushamwari zvekuti uyu ndiwo mutambo ucharatudza kusimba kwacho. Mutambo uyu wauya mumusha macho musina kumira zvakanaka mushure mekunge murairdzi wacho, Jorge Silva wekuBrazil, nezuro akarova mutori wemifananidzo yepaterevhizheni yeZimbabwe Braodcasting Corporation. Svondo rapera, Silva zvekare akakandirana makobvu nematete nemurairdzi wevabati vepagedhe wechikwata ichi, Gif Muzadzi, izvo zvave kuitisa mibvunzo mumabatiro ebasa rake. Asi vatsigiri venhabvu vari kutarisira kuti chikwata cheChicken Inn pamwe necheHarare City zvichavasiya vachipemberera pachapera mitambo yavo.

column2: Hazard asendeka shangu
column3: asendeka shangu dzekutambira nyika yake yeBelgium.   Mutambi uyu (31) akasarudza kusatambira nyika yake apo ichange ichirwira kuenda kumutambo we2024 European Championships uye ne2026 World Cup.   Zvichitevera kuburitswa kwakaita chikwata chake kuWorld Cup kuQatar, Hazard asiya mushure mekutambira nyika yake kwemakore 14 apo ave kutarisira kumutsiridza hupenyu hwake hwenhabvu kuReal Madrid.   “Nhasi ndavhura chimwe chikamu. Ndokutendai nerudo,” Hazard anonyora paInstagram.   “Ndokutendai nerutsigiro rwenyu. Ndinokutendai nenguva yemafaro atakave navo kubva gore ra2008.   “Nhasi ndasarudza kusiya kutambira nyika yangu. Chikwata chitsva chevechidiki chagadzirira. Ndichakusuwai zvikuru.”   Bepanhau rekuBelgium Het Laastest Nieuws rakanyora kuti Hazard akange akurukura nevamwe vaanotamba navo nhabvu kuti anoda kusiya kutambira nyika yake kubva pavakaburitswa kuWorld Cup neCroatia.   Mazuva matanhatu akatevera, Hazard haana kushandura pfungwa dzake sezvo akabva azivisa vanhu 27.2 miriyoni vanomutevera paInstagram.   Matambiro ake muchikwata cheBelgium ange adzikira izvo zvakaona mutambo waakapedzisira kutambira nyika yake kuWorld Cup achipinzwa kwatambwa maminitsi anodarika 87 wave kunopera.   Akatanga kutambira Belgium aine makore 17 okuberekwa mugore ra2008 apo vakatamba neLuxembourg nemusi wa19 Mbudzi, 2008.   Mutambi uyu, uyo aimbove kuChelsea, akakwanisa kutambira nyika yake ka126, ndokunwisa ka33 uye achibatsira vamwe vatambi kunwisa ka36.   Hazard akatungamira Belgium ari kaputeni mumitambo 56. – SportsMail Football

column2: Dare Rinowana Pator Mawarire Vasina Mhosva
column3:
Dare rapamusoro reHigh Court ratura mutongo wekuti Mufundisi Evan Mawarire, avo vanga vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidgura hurumende yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kubudikidza nekuratidzira kwakaitika gore rapera, havana mhosva. 

Mutongi wedare repamusoro, Muzvare Priscilla Chigumba, vatura mutongo wekuti VaMawarire havana mhosva yavakapara nokudaro vave munhu akasununguka.

Muzvare Chigumba vati hapana humbowo hwakajeka hwakasvitswa kudare nemagweta ehurumende pamwe nevafakazi panyaya iyi hunoratidza kuti VaMawarire vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vabvise hurumende yaVaMugabe pachigaro vachiti mavhidhiyo ose akaratidzwa dare anoratidza kuti VaMawarire vakurudzira veruzhinji kuratidzira murunyararo vachiti izvi zvinobvumidzwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika.

Mutongi atiwo hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti vanhu vakaita zvemhirizhonga pakuratidzirwa kwakaitwa kwemazuva maviri gore rapera kwaidaizwa kuti Shutdown Zimbabwe vakanga vakurudzirwa naVaMawarire kuti vaite mhirizhonga iyi.

Gweta raVaMawarire, VaHarrison Nkomo, vanoti vafara nemutongo waturwa nedare.

VaMawarire vanoti havafainira kunge vakatombomiswa mudare kubva pekutanga. VaMawarire vakasungwa gore rapera mushure mekuratidzira kwakatambirwa nevanhu vakawanda kusanganisira chikwata che Tajamuka. Zvichakadai, dare repamusoro rakatarisirwawo kutura mutongo nhasi wekuti ma aliens obvumirwa kunyoresa kuvhota here musarudzo dzegore rinouya kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Tsiva haina chibhanzi’
column3: MUTAMBI wetsiva wechidzimai Kudakwashe ‘Kudah’ Chivandire anoti mutambo uyu hausi kumubhadhara zvachose zvekuti ari kufunga kumbousiya ozama zvimwe zvekuti araramise mhuri yake.   Kudah – uyo anove shasha yeWomen’s International Boxing Association (WIBA) Inter-Continental Champion – achangobva kukunda Iriya Matoga wekuMalawi mumutambo wehushamwari wakaitirwa kuHarare International Centre (HICC) svondo rapera.   Makwishu aya aive ekutsigira mutambo waCharles Manyuchi uyo akakunda Diego Diaz Gallardo wekuArgentina.   “Chokwadi mutambo uyu hapana zvatiri kuwana, tikapinda mukembi chaimo tichigadzirira kuzorwa hapana chatinopihwa uye tinogaramo kwenguva ndefu chaiyo patinobuda tinopihwa tumari tusingatenge. Ipapo unenge une nguva ndefu wasiya mwana wako uyo anenge achida kuchengetwa.   “Ndinombofunga zvekusiya mutambo uyu uye parizvino nditori pakati pekugadzirisa kuti ndiite zvimwe zvinondipa pundutso muhupenyu hwangu.   “Ndinogona kugadzira musoro wangu, saka ndinogona kutanga bhizimisi rekugadzira musoro ndichiwana mari yekuraramisa ini nemhuri yangu. Pandinenge ndisingarwe ndoziva kuti ndine zvandinenge ndichiita zvinenge zvichindipa mari,” anodaro Kudah.   Kubva achitanga kuita zvetsiva, Kudah akwanisa kurwa mitambo mitanhatu ndokuhwina mina uye akakundwa miviri chete.   “Chishuvo changu kuti ndiraramise mwanasikana wangu uyo ane makore maviri ekuberekwa. Pandinoenda kunotamba tsiva ndotarisira kuti ndigodzoka ndine mari chaiyo inotenga yekuti ndigomutengera zvose zvaanoda.   “Asi manje ndanzwa nekuvimbiswa zvinhu zvakawanda asi hapana kana chiri kumbozadzikiswa pazvose,” anodaro Kudah.   Anoti murume wake – uyo anomutsigira zvikuru mumutambo uyu – ndiye anombosara achichengeta mwana wavo apo paanoenda kunotamba tsiva.   “Ndinotenda murume wangu nerutsigiro rwaanondipa, anoziva kuti ndine chido netsiva uye anonditsigira zvikuru,” anodaro.   Zvakadai, nhengo yeZimbabwe Boxing Board of Control, Thomas Kambuyi, anoti nyaya dzekubhadharana mari pakati pevatambi vetsiva nemamaneja avo dzinonetsa kupindira nekuti ivo sesangano havazive zvinenge zvakavimbisana mativi maviri aya.   “Chandingataure ini ndakazvimirira hangu ndechekuti mutambi uyu anofanirwa kugara pasi nemamaneja ake votaurirana kuti vagodzirisana sei zvavainge vakavimbisana. Isu ipapo hatikwanise kupindira sezvo takange tisipo vachiwirirana uye hatizive kuti vakavimbisana zvipi.   “Kutaura chokwadi hupenyu iye zvino hwaoma, mabhizimisi haasi kufamba zvakanaka uye isu vari mune zvemitambo zvakatikakatawo zvakare, mitambo yese iri kuchema kwete tsiva yoga,” anodaro.

column2: Sangano reVarimi reIntegrated Commercial Farmers Union Rokurudzira Kuti Mitengo yeZvirimwa Itarwe neMari yeKunze
column3: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varimi, reIntegrated Commercial Farmers’ Union, rinoti mitengo mitsva yezvirimwa yemwaka uno yakaziviswa nehurumende svondo rino yakanaka chose asi dambudziko rinozosangana nemurimi nderekuti vezvitoro vanobva vakwidzawo zvakanyanya mitengo yezvinodiwa nemurimi mumwaka unotevera. Hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti mwaka uno Grain Marketing Board ichange ichitenga chibage nemadhora zviuru gumu nezviviri nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe, kuchitiwo mbeu diki dzchitengwa nemadhora zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nemashanupatani. Soya bhinzi dzinonzi dzinenge dzchitengwa nemadhora zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana maviri negumi nerimwe patani. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weIntegratedCommercial Farmers’ Union, Amai Maiwepi Jiti, vanoti pari zvino mari iyi inoonekwa seyakawanda zvikuru asi panozosvika nguva yekugadzirira mwaka unouya inenge isisakwanire varimi kuti vakwanise kutenga zvavanoda. "Hongu mitengo yema inputs inokwira panotaurwa mitengo yembesa. Ndinokurudzira kuti dai hurumende yataura mutengo vachishandisa mari yekunze, sokuti chibage chonzi US$260.00. Then panguva ayekuti murimi ave kubhadharwa opiwa zvake maRTGs vachishandisa rate inenge iripo musi iwoyo," vanodaro Amai Jiti. Vanoti izvi zvinobatsirawo murimi kumudzivirira kubva kumitengo yezvikwanisiro zvekuti kana mitengo yakanzi yakwidzwazve haufe haanetseke kudzokera mumunda mwaka unotevera. Amai Jiti vanokurudzira hurumende kuti ipindirewo nekuona kuti mitengo yezvikwanisiro zvinodiwa nemurimi haizokwidzwi pasina mvumo inobva kwairi. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yotenda Kuti Kushaya Simba kweMari Kwopa Kuti Vari Pamudyandigere Vaomerwe neHupenyu
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vatenda kuti mari dziri kuwedzerwa vari pamudyandigere neNational Security Authority kana kut NSSA kutanga mwedzi uno hadzikwani nekuda kwekushaya simba kwedhora asi vachiti havo atsunya arwa. VaMavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende ichaita zvose zvainogona kuona kuti mari iyi hairambe ichishaya simba. Vatiwo vari kutambira mari yepasi vanenge vachiwana mari inosvika madhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica asi pachishandiswa chikero chemari chiri pamutemo kwete zviri kuitika pamukoto vakati mari iyi inosvika pamadhora mazana matatu kune vakabatirwa mari dzakati wandei vachiri kushanya. Mari idzi dziri kutangira pamadhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica asi pachishandiswa chikero chiri pamutemo kwete mari dzepamukoto. Vari pamudyandigere vane makore akawanda vachichema chema kuti mari kutambiriswa haisi kuvakwanira zvopa kuti vanonge svosve nemuromo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vatendawo kuti mari iyi ishoma zvichinyanya kukonzerwa nekuti dhora remunyika riri kutengeswa nemari inodarika mazana maviri emadhora padhora rekuAmerica kana kuti 1”200. Vatiwo vemabhizimisi vakawanda vanotengesa zvinhu vachishandisa chikero chemaei yepamukoto. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vatiwo vari pamudyandigere vachiri vakaomerwa nehupenyu sezvo mari iyi isingakwane kuti vatenge kana mishonga chaiyo kana vave kurwara. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revari pamudyandigere reAssociation of National Social Security Retirees Trust, VaGideon Shoko, vatiwo panotanga kubatwa zvimwe zvirehwa rehwa nevemabhanga mari iyi ishoma. Vatiwo haisvike pane inotarisirwa kuti mhuri irarame pamwedzi kana kuti Poverty Datum Line Vashandi vemumakambani nemuhurumende vanobatirwa mari pamwedzi neNSSA kuti vazopihwe kava vave pamudyandigere kana kuremara vari pabasa. Asi kwemakore vashandi vagara vachichema kuti huori hunotyisa hunoitika muNSSA hunopa kuti itadze kuvapa mari dzekuti vakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available

column2: ZRP Inoti Mari Yayakapihwa muBhajeti naVaNcube Haikwane Kutenga Pfuti, Hutsi Hunokatyidza neZvimwe
column3: Mubhajeti risati ratambirwa nedare reparamende kana kuti budget proposal ravakatura vhiki rapera, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakapa mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police kana kuti ZRP mari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi matanhatu emunyika kana kuti 60 billion dollars ekuita mabasa. Asi vakuru vemapurisa vanoti kuti vakwanise kuita zvavanotarisirwa kuita, vanoda mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mashanu nemakumi masere kana kuti 580 billion yemunyika.  Mumwe mutevedzeri wemukuru wemapurisa achiona nezvevashandi, Deputy Commissioner General (Human Resources) VaElliot Ngirandi, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende kuti ZRP mari yavari kunzi vapihwe kana bhajeti rikatambirwa nedare iri ishoma zvikuru pane zvavange vachitarisira.  Semuenzaniso, vatiwo vaida mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi maviri emadhora kana kuti 420 billion pamabasa akasiyana siyana akafanana nekutenga zvombo, motokari nezvimwe zvikwanisiro asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi nemaviri emadhora emunyika chete kaba kuti 12, 6 billion. VaNgirandi vati vaida mari inosvika makumi mashanu emabhiriyoni kana kuti 50 billion doallrs kuti vakwanise kuendesa mapurisa kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana siyana. Vati mapurisa anoenda kubasa asina mari yekubatsirikana kana kuti maallowances vakatiwo mapurisa ari kushandisa mbozhanhare dzavo pachinhambo chekushandisa zviovha zvepabasa. VaNgirandi vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vane vanenge vari muhusungwa kuzvitokisi havawani chekafu. Vatiwo kana zvipatara nemakirinika zveeZRP hazvina mishonga uyewo vaida mabhiriyoni matanhatu ekutenga mishonga asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni maviri chete pabhajeti regore rinouuya. VaNgirandi vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende kubva kukomiti inoona nezvemukati menyika nekomoti yeSeneti inoona nezverunyararo munyika kuti vataure negurukota rezvemari kuti riwedzere mapurisa mari . Asi munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaAaron Nhepera, vavimbisa nhengo dzeparamende kuti munyika hamusi kuzoita nyonga nyonga nekuda kwekuti ZRP yakapihwa mari shoma vachiti vakatoudza mutungamiriri wenyika nezvenyaya iyi. Vakumbirawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzitaure nebazi rezvemari kuti ripeZRP mvumo yekushandisa mari yefaindi nedzimwe dzainowa vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti mmapurisa awane mari yekushandisa yakakwana.  Zvichakadai mukuru mubazi reCivil Registry, Registrar General, VaHenry Machiri, vaudzawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti bazi ravo harina kuwana mari yaraida mubhajeti vachiti vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi reimwe kana kuti 1, 1 billion chete asi ivo vaida zana remabhiriyoni emadhora kana kuti 100 billion dollars.  VaMachiri vati vashandi vebazi ravo vakatoresa vanhu zvitupa mumatunhu ese munyika pasi pechirongwa cheNational Mobile Registration gore rino havasti vabhadhra. Varatidzawo kusafara nenyaya yekuti havana kupihwa mari yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota zvakare kana Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ichinge yapedzeda kutara miganhu yenzvimbo dzekuvhotera gore rinouya kana kuti Delimitation. VaNhepera vatiwo kunyoreswa kwevanhu kwakashosha uye vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende dzione zvadzingaiite kuti mari yekuita izvi iwanike. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekudzvirirwa kwenyika, VaAlbert Nguluvhe pamwe nasachigaro wekomiti inoona nezverunyararo, VaDavid Parirenyatwa vaudza VaNhepera nevamwe kuti vataure zvinhu zvakakosha zvavanoda kuti zviwedzera mari vachiti zviri pachena kuti hapana mari yakawanda yekupa kuzvirongwa zvese zvabazi ravo.  Pari zvino mapazi ese ehurumende ari kusangana nemakomiti eparamende achitaura kuti anoda kuwedzerwa mari yakawanda zvakadii paramende isati yapasa bhajeti re4.5 trilllion rakaturwa svondo rapfuura. Mapazi ehurumende ainge achida mari inosvika matrillion masere nemabhiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 8,7 trillion.

column2: Munyori Mukuru weUnited Nations Oshora Kuputika kweChinofungidzirwa Kuti Chombo muZimbabwe
column3: Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekuputika kwakaita chinofungidzirwa kuti chombo kana girinendi kuWhite City Sports Stadium kuBulawayo nemusi weMugovera rakapotsa rauraya mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatevedzeri vavo vaviri VaConstantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi avo vanonzi vakakuvara. VaGuterres vakurudzira kuti vane chekuita nekuputika uku vanofanira kusungwa voendeswa kumatare uye vakati vari kushuvira kuti vakakuvara vapore nekukurumidza. Vanhu vanosvika makumi mana nemapfumbamwe vakakuvara. Mapurisa ari kuenderera mberi achiferefeta nyaya iyi uye hapana ati asungwa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vati kana paine vane humbowo vanofanira kufonera matikitivha eCID Bulawayo panumber dzinoti 0292-71568, Bulawayo Central Police – 0292-72515 or CID headquarters – 0242-709134, kana National Complaints desk on 0242-703631, or WhatsApp number 0712800197 kana kumapurisa ari pedyo navo. Zvichakadaro, sangano remubatanidzwa wemakerereke yeZimbabwe Council of Churches (ZCC) vakumbira vemakereke kuti vabatane mukunamata uye kutsanya kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo murunyararo. Mizinda yekunze yakaita seEgypt, America, Britain neRussia yashorawo zvikuru zvakaitika muZimbabwe. VeSADC ne African Union vashorawo chiitiko ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaMaxwell Saungweme vanoti munyori mukuru weUnited Nations aifanira kubuda pachena kuti aya mabasa evanopfurikidza mwero. No media source currently available

column2: VaKhaya Moyo Vanobvuma Kuti Chabvondoka muZanu PF
column3: Bato re Zanu PF rinoti richasangana svondo rinouya kuti rizeya nyaya yekunetsana kuri mubato iri kana paine vanenge vaine zvichemo zvavanenge vatura kuPolitburo. Mashoko aya ataurwa nemutauriri webato iri, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, zvichiteveraa kunetsana nekurovana uye kukandirana makobvu nematete kuri kuenderera mberi mubato iri pamveri pemusangano waro we National Conference uri kutarisira kuitwa kuVictoria Falls muna Zvita. No media source currently available Vanhu vakawanda mubato iri vave makara asionane zvikuru vanonzi vari kutsigira chikwata chinonzi chinotungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nechimwe chinonzi Generation 40 chinosanganisira mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Asi Amai Mugabe naVaMnangagwa vanoti havana zvikwata zvavanotungamira. Vanoziva zviri kuitika muZanu PF vanoti chirongwa cheGeneration 40, kana kuti G40, chakauya kuburikidza nepfungwa dzevaimbove gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaJonathan Moyo, vachishanda nemamwe makurukota echidiki muZanu PF Mune kunetsana kunotyisa mumatunhu akawanda muZanu PF kusanganisira Masvingo, Harare, Mashonaland West, Mashonaland East neMashonaland Central. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vachiongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaClifford Mashiri, vanoti zvava kuitika muZanu PF zvinoratidza kuti bato iri chava chitima chisina musoro

column2: CZI Yozeya neChina Mamiriro Akaita Hupfumi
column3: Sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, iro riri kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri, riri kuita musangano wakakosha svondo rino kuti rione kuti zvinhu zvavandudzwa kuitira kuti makambani atange kushanda zvakanaka. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuCrown Plaza muHarare neChina. Vari kutarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu vakamirira mapazi ehurumende vanosanganisira gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, gurukota rezvemigodhi, VaWalter Chidhakwa, uye gurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaMike Bimha. Mukuru weCZI, VaClifford Siwela, vaudza Studio7 kuti vamwe vari kutarisirwa kuvako vamiriri veInternational Moneteray Fund neWorld Bank vari munyika, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nevamwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vachishanda neResources Exploitation, VaWashington Mehlomakulu, vanoti CZI inofanira kubuda nezvisungo zvainozoendesa kuhurumende kwete kumirira hurumende kuti iuye nezvisungo nekuti inenge yawandirwa nezvekuita. VaMehlomakulu vanoti basa rehurumende ndere kugadzira migwagwa, magetsi nezvimwe kwete kuronga zvemakambani. No media source currently available Sangano reCZI rinoti makambani emuZimbawe ari kushanda ari pasi pezvikamu zvitatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana izvo zvopa kuti vanhu vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa.

column2: VaAcie Lumumba Voparura Bato rezveMatongerwo eNyika
column3: Vaimbova nhengo yeZanu-PF VaAcie Lumumba vaparura bato ravo rinonzi VIVA party muHarare nemusi weChina. VaLumumba avo vati ndivo sachigaro webato iri vanonzi vange vachitukurira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaZhuwawo vakabuda mubato reZanu-PF mushure mekunge vanetsana negurukota rezvekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema VaPatrick Zhuwao. VaZhuwao vainge vasarudza VaLumumba kuita sachigaro weZimbabwe Youth Empowerment Council asi vakazovadzinga izvo zvakapa kuti vaviri ava vakandirane makobvu nematete. VaLumumba vanonzi vane makore makumi maviri nemanomwe ekuberekwa uye pasi pebumbiro remutemo havakwanise kupinda musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika sezvo zvichida munhu ane makore makumi mana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzataura neStudio 7 dzati zvinonetsa kuti VaLumumba vaite mutsindo mushure mekubatwa mumambure enyaya dzehuori uye kufumurwa apo vakaburitsirwa vhidhiyo vachiita zvepabonde nemumwe musikana.

column2: Mari Itsva Yotarisirwa Munyika Mukati meMasvondo Maviri
column3: Bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, razivisa kuti richadhinda mari itsva ichange ichishandiswa mumabhanga serimwe rematanho ariri kutora mukugadzirisa nyaya yekushomeka kwemari munyika pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu mumabhanga nemisika yemari munyika. Gavhuna webhanga iri, zvakare vari sachigaro vekomiti yebhanga iri inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari, yeMonetary Policy Committee, Dr John Mangudya, vati mari iyi inosanganisira madhora maviri emakoini nemadhora mashanu ebepa ichange yave mumabhanga mukati memasvondo maviri ari kutevera. Vachitaura mumushure memusangano wekutanga weMonetary Policy Committee, VaMangudya vati komiti yavo haisi kufara kuti mumaabhanga hamuna mari inokwanira munhu wese ndosaka vatora danho rekuunza mari itsva. VaMangudya vatiwo vari kuwedzera mari pamusika wemari yekunze kana kuti Interbank Rate vachiti matanho aya achederedza mitengo yezvinhu. VaMangudya vatiwo pane mari yakawanda isina zvairi kushandiswa yakangogara mumabhanga uye komiti yavo yatora danho rekuti mari iyi ishandiswe pakurima pamwe nekugadzirisa zvinhu kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pamari yose iri mumabhanga munyika, mabhirioni gumi nemapfumbwamwe emadhora, makambani makumi mashanu chete ndiwo ane zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvemari iyi. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, RBZ yakavhara maAccounts emakambani akaita se Sakunda, Croco neAccess Finance achinzi aishandisa mari zvisina tsarukanao uye afaingudzirwa kuti ndiwo aiita zvekutenga nekutengesa mari pamusika mutema. Sachigaro vesangano rinomirira mabhanga munyika, reBankers Association of Zimbabwe, VaWebster Rusere, vati semaonero avo, Monetary Policy Committee yabuda nematanho akanaka chose. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti danho rekuwedzera mari mumabhanga rakanaka chose asi sezvo vanhu vange vatambura nekutengeserwa mari nemakoronyera. Vaenderera mberi vachiti zvakakosha kuti bhanga guru renyika ritorewo matanho anoshaisa makoronyera anotengesa mari mukana wekuramba achiomesera vanhu. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti nyika inofranirwa kungwarira kuti munyika musawanzwe, akana kudhinda mari inodarika hupfumi hwenyika, sezvo izvi zvichikonzera kuparara zvakanyanya kwesimba remari munyika. No media source currently available

column2: Vakarwa Hondo yeRusununguko Voronga Nhaurirano neBritain
column3: Vanotungamirira sangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association vanoti vari kuronga musangano neBritain nedzimwer nyika dzakabudirira kuti vagadzirise nyaya yemagariro avo sezvo vari kuti hurumende yavarasa. Vesangano re ZLHR ava vakataura mashoko aya apo vakaita musangano nevatori venhau muHarare nemusi weChina. Munyori mukuru musangano re ZNLWA VaVictor Matemadanda vati kunyangwe hazvo vakazoshorwa kuti vave kuita misangano nevekumawirira havana hany'a nazvo sezvo chinangwa chavo chiri chekuti varwi vehondo yerusununguko vabatsirikane. Vati vane chivimbo chekuti hurukuro dzavachaita idzi dzichabatsira kusimudzira hupenyu hwevarwi verusununguko. VaMatemadanda vashoropodzawo Brigadier General Retired Asher Walter Tapfumaneyi munyori mubazi revakarwa hondo vachiti vanofanira kuregedza kuda kutonga sangano revarwi vehondo yerusununguko. VaTapfumaneyi vanoti hurumende yave kuda vatungamiri vatsva sezvo isingakwanise kushanda nevatungamiri varipo nekuti vakati mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ngavaende pamudyandigere vachitiwo havachavatsvagire rutsigiro. VaMatemadanda vati bato reZanu PF harina kumboita hany'a nevarwi vehondo yerusununguko uye sangano ravo isangano rakazvimirira risinei nebato reZanu PF. Vatiwo vari kushushikana kuti kunyangwe vakarwa hondo, vana veZimbbwe havana rusununguko. Vanoona nezvemabasa musangano iri, VaFrancis Nhando vatsigira mashoko aya vachiti vakazvionera pamhuno sefodya apo vange vobvunzurudzwa nemapurisa kuti sei vange vakamira muHarare Gardens vari vana apo vaigadzirira kuita musangano wavo. Vanoona nezvekubuditswa kwemashoko musangano iri, VaDouglas Mahiya vati vanokatyamadzwa kuti hurumende inoda kupindira munyaya dzesangano revarwi verusunungukonekuyedza kuri putsa. Musangano uyu wange uine vanasachigaro vekumatunhu akasiyana-siyana avo vati kunyangwe hazvo hurumende ichida kuvanganisa, vari kuzoramba vachibatira pamwe nemukuru wavo VaChristopher Mutsvangwa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvevakarwa hondo VaTshinga Dube kana VaTapfumaneyi sezo vange vasiri kudarira nharembozha dzavo. No media source currently available

column2: Bazi rezveHutano Roongorora Vanhu Vakabva Kunyika Dzine Chirwere cheCoronavirus
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti pane vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe vakabva kunyika dzakabatwa vanhu chirwere che coronavirus vari kumboongororwa munyika kusvika musi wa7 Kukadzi kuti vaonekwe kuti havana kutapurirwa chirwere ichi here. Vanhu ava vakasvika munyika pakati pa25 na28 Ndira, unove mwedzi uno, vachibva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzabatwa nedambudziko rechirwere ichi, kusanganisira China, uko kwachakatangira. Chirwere ichi chauraya vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi manomwe kuChina kwakare uye vamwe vanodarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu vabatwa nacho kusvika pari nhasi munyika iyi. Kunze kweChina, chirwere ichi chawanikwawo kunyika dzinosvika gumi nesere dzinosanganisira America, France, Germany, Japan neVietnam. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vanoona zviri zvinhu zvakanaka zvekudzivirira vanhu kuti chirwere ichi chisapararira. Doctor Madzorera vanotiwo vanoona zvakakodzera kuti vanhu vari kutarisiswa ava vange vachimbogara vari kudzimba dzavo vachiongororwa sezvo pasati pave nemunhu abatwa nechirwere. Vanoti nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu mune zveupfumi, Zimbabwe haizokwanise kuita sedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzinonzi dzakatovaka zvipatara zvekuchengetera vanhu vari kuongororwa kana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

column2: VaCharamba Vokonzera Kugeda Geda KweMeno neMashoko Avo paNyaya yeKuratidzira
column3: Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba vakonzera mutauro wakanyanya pasi rose nemashoko avanonzi vakataura kubepanhau reSunday Mail vari ku Azerbaijan uko vari kushanya nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaCharamba vanoti zviri kuitika munyika umo muri kupomerwa mauto nemapurisa mhosva yekupfura vanhu gumi nevaviri, kukuvadza mazana nemazana uye kusunga vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe inzwisa chete. VaCharamba vanoti mhirizhonga iri kukonzera nebato reMDC nemapato akazvimirira. Mapepa nhau emunyika dzakawanda aratidza kukatyamadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aya. Asi masangano akaita seUnited Nations, nyika dzakaita seAmerica, Britain nesangano reEuropean Union ari kushora zvikuru nyaya yekushandisa mauto mukushungurudza vanhu iri kuitwa neZimbabwe. Sangano ravanasorojena rinozivikanwa nekuti The Elder’s rashorawo zviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe zvekushungurudza vanhu uye kudzima masaisai einternet. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaCharamba kuti tinzwe zvizere nezvemashoko avo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Vakawanda vanoti munyika maberekera ingwe. Asi gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti zvinhu zvave kuita zviri nani avo vakurudzira vanhu kuti vasaite mhirizhonga. No media source currently available

column2: Bhodhi Idzva reZimra Rinogadzwa Richitungamirwa naVaCallisto Jokonya
column3: Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakazivisa neChitatu mazita evanhu vatanhatu vachange vari mubhodhi idzva reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra. VaNcube vakati sachigaro webhodhi iri vachange vari muzvinabhizimisi ane mukurumbira, VaCallisto Jokonya, mutevedzeri wavo ari Amai Josephine Matambo. Dzimwe nhengo dzebhodhi iri ndiVaGeorge Guvamatanga, VaIsaac Kwesu, Memory Nguwi naDoctor Morris Mpofu. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga vachitengesa reInternational Crossborder Traders Association, VaDenis Juru, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange havo vachiremekedza VaJokonya semunhu anoziva zvemabhizimisi, VaJokonya havangakwanisi kupedza huori huri kuZimra nekuti huori uhu hunobva kumusoro soro kwehurumende kunove iko kunofanirwa kutanga kugadziriswa. VaJokonya vaudza Studio7 kuti vanga vari kunze kwenyika uye havakwanisi kutaura nesu. No media source currently available

column2: VaMnangagwa neVamwe Vakapidugura Hurumende Havana Kukokwa kuMusangano naVaBiden Uri Kutanga neChipiri
column3: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nemusi weChipiri muWashington DC vari kuparura musangano wekudyidzana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica kana kuti US-Africa leaders’ summit. Kunyangwe hazvo vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakawanda vakakokwa kumusangano uyu, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemutevedzeri wavo VaConstantino Chiwenga havana kukokwa nenyaya dzezvirango zvavakatemerwa vachipomerwa mhosva dzekutonga nedemo. Vamwe vatungamiri vasina kukokwa nekuda kwekupidigura hurumende nechisimba vanosanganisira veSudan, Mali, Burkina Faso neGuinea avo vakambomiswa kuva nhengo dzesangano reAfrican Union. Vatungamiri makumi mana nevashanu ndivo vakakokwa kumusangano uyu. Zimbabwe inenge yakamirirwa negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe VaFrederick Shava.  Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa vainge vakokwa vanonzi havachakwanise kuenda kuAmerica. VaRamaphosa vakatarisana nemhosva huru yavari kupomerwa yekuita zvehuwori vamwe vachiti vanofanira kumanikidzwa kusiya basa. Pane kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati peAmerica neZimbabwe nenyaya yezvirango iyi. Zimbabwe inoti zvapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugwadame. Asi America inoti huwori nekutadza kutungamira ndiko kwapa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hunange kumawere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira sangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Commerce, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha kuAmerica iyo yave kusaririra munyaya dzezvekudyidzana neAfrica zvapa mukana wakakura kuRussia neChina. Asi hurumende yeAmerica inoramba kuti kuda kukwikwidzana neChina neRussia ndicho chinangwa chikuru chemusangano uyu. No media source currently available

column2: Mapazi eHurumende neVamwe veParamende Voramba Kutambira Bhajeti ra2022
column3: Apo hurukuro dziri kuenderera mberi kuti bhajeti rakaparurwa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube rotambirwa here nedare reparamende kana kuti kwete, pave kubuda mutauro wakanyanya. Mapazi ehurumende akawanda ari kuti mari dzavakapihwa hadzina zvadzinobatsira uye VaNcube vane nhoroondo yekusavapa mari dzavanenge vataura mubhajeti. Bhajeti rakaparurwa naVaNcube rinofanira kutambirwa nematare ose eparamende anoti reHouse of Assembly neSenate kuti ritange kushanda zviri pamutemo. Asi rwendo rwuno dzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamende dziri kuti haiziyiwe. Vamwe vasiri kufara nebhajeti rakaparurwa iri mumiriri weNorton VaTemba Mliswa. Vanoti VaNcube havafanire kuvimbisa mari dzavasingazope mapazi ehurumende. Vakafanobata chigaro chemubati wehomwe mubazi rezvehutano Amai Lynette Tennis vakaudza dare reparamende kuti mari yakapihwa bazi ravo haikwane uye inotoisa hupenyu hwevanhu munjodzi. Bazi iri rakapihwa mari inosvika mabhiriyoni zana negumi nemanomwe kana kuti 117 billion yemunyika mubhajeti regore rinouya. Amai Tennis vakati zvikamu makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana zvemari yekurapa TB, Malaria, hutano hwemadzimai nezvimwe yakabva kumasangano akazvimirira anoti Global Fund nehomwe yemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica yePresident’s Emergency Plan For Aids Relief. Asi muzinda weAmerica wakatozivisa hurumende kuti itsvage nzira dzekubatsira vanorarame nehutachiona hweHIV/Aids. Hurumende yaibatsirikana zvikuru nemari yehomwe yeAIDS Levy inobatirwa vashandi asi inonzi yave shoma sezvo vakawanda vari kuzviitira mabasa emaoko vasingabhadhare. Rimwe bazi riri kuti rakapihwa mari ishoma nderedzidzo riri kuti zvirongwa zvakaita sezve Continuous Assessment Learning Activity kana kuti CALA zvichazviringidzwa zvakanyanya nemari shoma yarakapihwa. VaMliswa vanoti kugadzirisa dambudziko iri dai hurumende yaita bhajeti nemari yekuAmerica. VaMliswa vanoti zviri nani hazvo kuti dai VaNcube vakaparura bhajeti iri nemari yekuAmerica. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti mari inoshandiswa haina hayo kunyanya kukosha nekuti. VaNcube vakazivisa havo kuti mapazi ehurumende akanga akumbira mari inoda kusvika matrilion maviri nemabhiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 2, 7 trillion yemunyika asi ivo vainge vaine mari inodarika zvishoma mabhiriyoni mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 927 billion yemunyika. VaNcube vakati chavari kuyedza kuita mubhajeti yavo kubatsira varombo kunyanya.

column2: Zvikwata zveNhabvu Zvokweshana Mukupera kweSvondo
column3: Makundano eCastle Lager Premier Soccer League ari kupinda munharaunda yechipiri muine mitambo yakawandisa muHarare. MuHarare chete muchange muine mitambo mishanu, mitatu yacho mangwana sezvo zvimwe zvikwata zvekunze kweHarare zviri kutambira muguta iri mushure mekunge nhandare dzavo dzakanzi hadzikodzere kutambirwa nhabvu yepamusoro. Mutare City Rovers iri kubva kwaMutare kuzotamba neChapungu muNational Sports Stadium muHarare. Svondo rapera, zvikwata zvakaita seNitchrut ne Shabanie Mine zvakatambirawo kunze kwemusha asi zvikakunda izvo muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu, VaInnocent Mutena, vatsinhira kuti nhabvu hainei kuti muri kutambira kupi. Mutambo pakati peMutare City Rovers neChapungu uri kutambwa nguva dzekudya dzemasikati sezvo nhandare iyi iri kushandiswa zvekare zuva rimwechetero nechikwata cheBlack Rhinos icho chiri kusangana neZPC Kariba. Harare City ichange iri muRufaro Stadium neBulawayo City. Herentals iri kutamba Highlanders muNational Sports Stadium neSvondo. Ukuwo Dynamos iri pamusha neShabanie. Dembare yakarohwa 1-0 neChicken Inn svondo rapera. Murairdzi weDembare, Lloyd Mutasa, anoti ane tarisiro huru gore rino. FC Platinum iri pamusha muMandava Stadium neYadah. Mimwe mitambo iriko yakamira seizvi: Triangle United v Ngezi Platinum Stars - Gibbo Bulawayo Chiefs v Caps United - Luveve Zvichakadaro, chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors chiri kupinda munhandare yeLevy Mwanawasa Stadium muNdola, Zambia, neSvondo, chichiedza kutanda nyadzi apo chiri kusangana neAngola mumutambo wekugumisira mumakwikwi ezvikwata zvina. Zimbabwe yakadamburwa neZambia mumutambo wavo wekutanga zvekuti iri kutarisira kukunda mumutambo uyu kuti isapedze iri pachinhanho chekugumisira mumakwikwi ayo, ari kusangana Zambia neSouth Africa mufainari. Murairdzi wemaWarriors, Sunday Chidzambwa, ari kushandisa makundano aya kutarisa vatambi vaachada kushandisa mumakundano e2019 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers umo Zimbabwe iri mugungano rimwechete neCongo DR, Congo Brazzaville, neLiberia. Chikwata chimwe chete kubva mugungano iri ndicho chichaenda kumafainari ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon muna 2019. No media source currently available

column2: MaGems otarira mberi
column3: MUTUNGAMIRI wevatambi vechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems, Felisitus Kwangwa, anoti gadziriro dzekuenda kuWorld Cup gore rinotevera dzinotanga iko zvino sezvo vanoda kunorwa semvumba kumutambo uyu.   MaGems akadadisa nyika zvekare svondo radarika zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita tikiti rekuenda kuNetball World Cup 2023 iyo ichatambirwa kuSouth Africa.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chiri kudzokera kumakwishu aya uko chakamboenda mugore ra2019 kuLiverpool, kuEngland.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Kwangwa anoti zvinhu zvinofadza kutungamirira nyika yake kumutambo mukuru uyu.   “Ndinonzwa manyukunyuku kupihwa chiremerera ichi chekutungamira nyika yangu kumutambo mukuru uyu.   “2019 ndaivepo zvekare ndiri mutevedzeri waPerpetua Siyachitema saka kupihwa mukana wekutungamirira nyika yangu chiremerera chikuru uye ndinotenda.   “Sechikwata, ndinovimba kuti tichanotamba zvinonwisa mvura kuWorld Cup nekuti takambokuenda uye tave kuziva zvinodiwa kuti tigohwina,” anodaro.   Kwangwa, uyo anotambira chikwata cheSurrey Storm kuEngland, anoti murwendo rwavo kuenda kuWorld Cup vanoda kutamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda sezvo ichibatsira zvakanyanya mugadziriro dzavo.   “Kutanga iko zvino tinofanirwa kutamba mitambo yehushamwari yakawanda yekugadzirira iyo ichatibatsira zvikuru patichaenda kuSouth Africa.   “Mitambo yehushamwari yakakosha, ndiyo yega nzira ichatibatsira mugadziriro dzedu,” anodaro Kwangwa.   MaGems akabudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup zvichitevera kupedza kwaakaita ari pechitatu mumitambo yeAfrica Qualifiers yakatambirwa kuSouth Africa svondo radarika.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakapedza chiri kumashure kweSouth Africa neMalawi.   Kumitambo iyi, maGems akatamba mitanhatu ndokuhwina mina uye akakundwa miviri neSouth Africa neMalawi ndokuhwina menduru yebhuronzi.   Dunhu reAfrica kuWorld Cup richange rakamirirwa neZimbabwe, South Africa neMalawi.

column2: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu (15) Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
column3: Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika neMugovera vamwe mazana masere nenakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana mana nemakumu masere nevatatu kana kuti 483. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparira gore rapera vave zvuru makumi maviri nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 20, 499. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru gumi bezviviri zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 12, 439 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu mazana maviri nemamakumi mashanu nevashanu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 7, 577. Kunyangwe muHarare nemuBulawayo muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mumatunhu ose hwawedzera zvave kutyisa kana nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa Dr Portia Manangazira vanoti svondo rino hurumende iri kutarisira ongororo inobuditsa pachena kuti kufa nekubatwa kwevanhu nechirwere ichi kuri kukonzerwa nekamwe kamhando katsva kechirwere ichi kakabatwa kuSouth Africa neBritain uye kanzoni kanopararira zvakanyanya kana muvana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi manomwe nemaviri zvine zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 72,121. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 89, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 372, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 22 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvisere kana kuti 49, 8 million.

column2: Vakaona maWarriors mahara
column3: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vane chitsama nemusi weChishanu chadarika vakaona bhora remaWarriors neBotswana reAfcon Qualifier kuNational Sports Stadium “mahara’’ sezvo vaingosvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare iyi apo mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police aive akayeva.   Mubhadharo wekupinda munhandare yeNSS waive $20 kubhombera, kugara paBay 15 kusvika ku18 kwaiita $50 kozoti kuVIP kwaita $120.   Asi kune vamwe – vanhurume nevanhukadzi –  vakapinda mahara apo vaisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda mukati menhandare.   Kwayedza yakazvionera vamwe vatsigiri venhabvu vachisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare iyi uye mamwe mapurisa aitonzwikwa achikurudzira vatsigiri ava achiti, “Svetukai nekuchimbidza”.   Mutauriri wemapurisa munyika Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vanoti imhosva huru kana mapurisa akatyora mutemo nekusaita basa ravo nemazvo zvakadai sekupihwa chiokomuhomwe vachisiya munhu achipara mhosva.   Vanoti pachaferefetwa nyaya yemapurisa ari kupomerwa kuti aisiya vanhu vachisvetuka mudhuri vachipinda munhandare yeNSS nenzira dzechitsotsi.   “Imhosva huru iyoyo uye hatitombozvitendere, kana paine vaizviita tichavatsvaga uye vakabatwa mutongo wavanopihwa wakakura zvekusvika pakudzingwa basa.   “Hatitarisire mapurisa edu kuita izvozvo zvekupinza vanhu munhandare mahara ivo vachifanirwa kuchengetedza kuona kuti vanhu havasi kupinda mahara uye hatitode kunzwa kuti pane vari kutambira chiokomuhomwe kuti vanhu vatyore mutemo. Isu semapurisa, hatidi hunhu ihoho,” vanodaro Asst Comm Nyathi.   Mutauriri wesangano reZifa uyo anovazve competitions manager, Xolisani Gwesela, paakaziviswa nezvenyaya iyi neKwayedza musi watambwa mutambo uyu akangoti anoda kurakidzwa mifananidzo yacho iyo akarakidzwa nemutori wenhau uno asi ndokungoridza tsamwa achirakidza kushamisika nazvo.   Svondo rino, Kwayedza yakazomutumira mibvunzo paWhatsApp ichibvumunzisisa kuti Zifa yakawana marii kubva pamutambo weZimbabwe neBotswana, Gwesela ndokuti vachiri kumboongorora kuti vakawana marii.   Paakabvunzwa nezvenyaya yemapurisa ayo aisiya vanhu vachipinda munhandare mahara, Gwesela anoti akange asina kuona mifananidzo yacho zvakanaka saka anoda kuti munyori uno amutumire.   “Tichiri kuongorora kuti tione kuti zvakafamba sei.   “Mubvunzo wechipiri, tangai manditumira mifananidzo yacho, handinda kuiona zvakanaka,” anodaro Gwesela.   Mumutambo uyu, Zimbabwe neBotswana zvakaita mangange 0-0 izvo zvakasiya vatsigiri vazhinji vemaWarriors vachigunun’una zvikuru.   Zvakadai, mumutambo wakatambirwa kuLusaka, kuZambia nemusi weChipiri chino, Zimbabwe yakakunda Zambia 2 – 1.   MaWarriors ari muGroup H umo mune zvimwe zvikwata zvinosanganisira Algeria, Zambia neBotswana.

column2: Madzimai Obatwa Chibharo neKubirwa Zvowedzerwa Nekushomeka kweMabhazi eZUPCO
column3: Sangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti danho rehurumende rekubvisa makombi mumigwagwa nechinangwa chekuda kuvamanikidza kuti vaite mushandirapamwe nekambani yehurumende yeZUPCO rave kuisa hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda munjodzi. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwemadzimai ari kubatwa chibharo uye kubirwa zvakanyanya kwevanhu nevanhu vane motokari dzinozivikanwa nekuti mishikashika. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, mapurisa anoti vanhu havafanire kukwira motokari dzemushikashika idzi uye havafanire kutakura mari yakawanda. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi mumashoko kuvatori vanhu vanotiwo muHarare ndimo manyanya nyaya dzekubatwa chibharo kwemadzimai uye kubirwa kwevanhu. Motokari dziri kushandiswa nematsotsi aya dzinosanganisira maHonda Fit nemaToyota Wish, vanhu vari kubirwa mari nenharembozha. Vanhu vakawanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi eZUPCO mashoma nekudaro vanozogumisira vakwira chero motokari. Mutungamiri wePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi mashoma zvosiya vanhu vokwira motokari dzematsotsi. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yogunun'una neKurambidzwa Kutengesa Nyanga dzeNzou kuCITES
column3: Gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa Amai Oppah Muchinguri kashiri vari kushora zvikuru nyika dziri kuda kurambidza Zimbabwe kutengesa nyanga dzenzou dziri mudura maro. Amai Muchinguru-Kashiri vataura mashoko aya kumusangano weConvention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora kana kuti CITES uri kuitirwa kuJohannesburg, South Africa. Nyika dzakaita seKenya, China neAmerica dzinoti nyanga dzenzou hadzifanire kutengeswa sezvo zvichizokonzera kuti vari kuvhima nzou zvisiri pamutemo varambe vachizviita. Kenya mwedzi yapfuura yakapisa nyanga dzenzou dzayo dzose. Mukuru wesangano reU.S. Fish and Wildlife Service VaDan Ashe vanoti kuti nzou dzisapere dzose nyanga hadzifanire kutombotengeswa zvachose. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe ine nyanga dzenzou dzinopfuura mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe mudura mayo uye inoda kuti dzitengeswe.

column2: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reMagamba VaMugabe Vachishora Vanopikisa
column3: Zimbabwe yakacherechedza zuva remagamba nemusi weMuvhuro mutungamiriri wenyika,VaRobert Mugabe vachishora zvakaitwa nemasoja zvekurova mapurisa nguva pfupi yapfuura vachiti izvi zvinokanganisa mabasa ekuchengetedza nyika. Vachitaura pamarinda eHeroes Acre, VaMugabe vakati vakataura nevakuru-vakuru vemasoja vakavaudza kuti izvi hazvifaniri kuitika zvakare. VaMugabe vatiwo vanoda runyararo sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rinouya. Mukuru webato re Multi Racial Christian Democracts, VaMathias Guchutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aVaMugabe akanaka chose sezvo nyika ichifanira kuva nerunyararo. VaMugabe vakashorawo vamwe varimi vechitema avo vati vave kushanda nevamwe varimi vechichena avo vakambenge vatiza munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika akashorawo vamwe vanhu vemuZimbabwe avo vati vanotsigira zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzakaita seBritain. Vakaenderera mberi vachitiwo hazvigoni kuti nhengo dzebato rinopikisa dziradzikwe panzvimbo inovigwa magamba yeHeroes Acre. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJonstone Chirwai vaudza Studio 7 kuti zuva remagamba rakakosha chose uye vanhu vemuZimbabwe vano remekedza magamba kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro emamwe magamba akaita semutungamiriri wenyika VaMugabe. Vatiwo zuva remagamba izuva ravanonyanyorangarira magamba aya asina kudzoka kubva huhondo. Mukuru webato rinopikisa reFreezim Congress, VaJoseph Busha vati zuva remagamba rakakosha chose uye magamba ose anofanira kuchengetedzwa nehurumende. Mumashoko avo pazuva remagamba, mutungamiriri webato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democractic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vati zuva riri rakakosha chose uyewo zvinofadza kuti vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko vave kuonawo kuti vakarwira munhu mumwe chete nemhuri yake. Vakaendera mberi vachiti magamba akarwisa hurumende yehudzvanyiriri yeRhodesia asi hapana kana mutsauko uripo pakati payo nehurumende yaVaMugabe. VaTsvangirai vati vanhu vese vanofanira kunyoresa kuti vavhote musarudzo dzegore rinouya kuitira kuti vachengetedze rusununguko rwavo. Vatiwo vechidiki havafanire kubatwa kumeso naVaMugabe pamisangano yavari kuita mumatunhu akasiyana siyana, vachiti vechidiki ava vanofanira kuziva kuti remangwana renyika riri mumaoko mavo. No media source currently available

column2: VaBiden Vanokunda VaTrump Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weAmerica
column3: Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri weAmerica zvichitevera kukunda kwavaita mudunhu rePennsylvania.  VaBiden, avo vane makore makumi manomwe nemasere ekuberekwa, vatora zvigaro zvose makumi maviri zve electoral college zvemudunhu rePennsylvania ndokuita zvigaro zvinodarika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe vachidarika zvigaro zvinodiwa kuti munhu adomwe semunhu akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaBiden vakunda mutungamiri weAmerica pari zvino, VaDonald Trump, avo vakabuda pachena kuti vari kupikisa mumatare maverengerwo akaitwa mavhoti mumamwe matunhu emuAmerica.  VaBiden vachaitwa mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu apo vachagadzwa zviri pamutemo muna Ndira gore rinouya. Kukunda kwaVaBiden kunoreva kuti mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Kamala Harris, vari kupinda munhoroondo yekuva mudzimai wekutanga, uye ari mutema, kuva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika munhoroondo yeAmerica yemakore mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemana.  VaBiden vakashanda vari mutevedzeri waVaBarack Obama kubva muna 2009 kusvika muna Ndira 2017, apo pakatoreswa VaTrump mhiko yekuva mutungamiri wenyika mushure mekukunda Amai Hilary Clinton musarudzo yakaitwa muna Mbudzi 2016. VaBiden vakashandawo senhengo yedare Senate kwemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi paDeVry University kuOhio, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvanga zviri pachena kuti VaBiden vachakunda musarudzo iyi. Asi VaMasocha vanoti VaBiden vane mutoro mukuru wekugadzirisa zvinhu munyika pamwe nekunze kwenyika zvavati zvakavhiringwa naVaTrump. No media source currently available

column2: Zimbabwe Yotarisana neKudzingwa Munhabvu yePasi Rose?
column3: Zimbabwe inogona kudzingwa munhabvu yepasi rose chero nguva zvichitevera kukundikana kweSports and Recreation Commission, SRC, kudzosera bhodhi reZifa rayakadzingwa muna Mbudzi gore rapera. SRC yakadzinga bhodhi iri ichiti rainge rashandisa mari zvisiri pamwero. Asi sangano renhabvu yepasi rose, reFederation of International Football, Fifa, rakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti rakanga risiri kufara nekupindira kwehurumende mukufambiswa kwenhabvu munyika. Sangano iri rakazivisa kuti bhodhi reZifa rikasadzorerwa musi wa Ndira 3, 2022 asati apfuura, Fifa yaizotorera nhabvu yemuZimbabwe matanho akaomarara. Asi SRC inoti haisi kuzodzosera bhodhi reZifa, uye haina kuwana tsamba yakabva kuFifa iri kutaura nezvekudzoserwa kwebhodhi iri. Sachigaro veSRC, VaGerald Mlotshwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti Fifa yakatarira nguva iyi kuZifa, vakati hapana nguva yakatarirwa SRC. VaMlotshwa mukuwasha wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, sezvo vakaroora mwanasikana wavo, Farai Celine Mnangagwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemitambo, VaMathias Tongofa, kuti tinzwe pamire komiti yavo panyaya iyi. Asi imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vanoti hunhinhi huri kuitwa neSRC huchaita kuti Zimbabwe idzingwe munhabvu yepasi rose sezvo mitemo yeFifa isingadi kuti dzihurumende dzipindire mukufambiswa kwenhabvu munyika dzepasi rose. VaSaruwaka vanoti Fifa inotora matanho akaomarara pose panenge patyorwa mitemo yayo. Vanotiwo sezvo zuva rakatarwa rakapfuura madeko, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kunyorera Fifa ichikumbira ruregerero uye kuona kuti bhodhi reZifa radzoserwa kuitira kuti Zimbabwe isadzingwe munhabvu yepasi rose. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemitambo, Kirsty Coventry, sezvo vanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo. VaSaruwaka vanoti pari zvino komiti yavo haisi kuita basa zvichitevera kumiswa kweparamende kuungana ichiita basa rayo kusvika mwedzi unouya nepamusana pedambudziko rechirwere. cheCovid-19. Asi VaSaruwaka vanoti pachavhura paramende, vachada kunzwa kuSRC kuti seyi yakatora danho rinoisa nhabvu yemunyika parumananzombe. Zimbabwe iri kuCameroon kumakwikwi eAfcon, uko inogona kudzingwa kana chero nguva kana Fifa ikatora danho rekudzinga Zimbabwe munhabvu yepasi rose sezvayinoita kunyika dzinenge dzatyora mitemo yayo. No media source currently available

column2: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
column3: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vakawanda vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vari mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kana vanhu vakawanda munyika vakabaiwa nhomba yeCovid -19, zvinoderedza njodzi yedenda iri iro ranetsa pasi rose. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vatiwo vanhu vakabaiwa vakawanda zvinoderedza kufamba kwechirwere ichi. VaMadzorera vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumnde izivisewo veruzhinji mashandiro ari kuita nhomba munyika vachiti izvi zvikazivikanwa neveruzhinji zvinobatsirawo mukuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vanoenda kunobaiwa nhomba idzi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano sezvo takundikana kubata mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano , Doctor John Mangwiro, pamwe nemutauriri webazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri. Asi hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti Covid-19 yakauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu nezuro, uye vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru zana negumi nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanunevasere(119 508), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvinanemakumi manomwe nevatatu, (4 073). Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yese vave pamamiriyoni mavirinezvuru gumi nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana(2 013340). Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni nezvuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevanomwe(1 179 687). No media source currently available

column2: Vanhukadzi Vechidiki Vokurudzirwa Kupinda Musarudzo
column3: Sangano reInstitute for Young Women’s Development rinoti riri kushanda nemamwe masangano evechidiki mukukurudzira vanhukadzi vechidiki kumaruwa kuti vatore zvigaro zvematongerwo enyika musaruzdzo dza 2018. Mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvare Glanis Changachirere, vanoti vakatanga basa iri zvichetevera musangano wavakaita gore rapfuura uyo wakaratidza kuti madzimai echidiki kumaruwa haana zvigaro mungava mumakanzuru kana muparamende. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti madzimai aya anosangana nematambudziko akawanda akaita sekushaiswa mukana, mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika nezvimwe uye ivo vari kuita basa rekuvadzidzisa nezvekodzero panyaya dzesarudzo. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti kana madzimai aya akasadaro, anosarira munyaya dzebudiriro nekuti hapana anenge achisumdzira nyaya dzavo mumakanzuru kana muparamende. Vanotiwo kunze kwemuparamende nemumakanzuru, madzimai echidiki anofanira kutora zvigaro zvehutungamiriri munzvimbo dzavanogara. Muzvare Charity Chaturuka vesangano reZimbabwe Young Women for Peace Building vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kubuda pachena kuti madzimai echidiki ekumaruwa haana ruzivo nezvekodzeo dzavo. Vanotiwo rimwe dambudziko rine madzimai nderekushaya mari dzekuti vatsvagise rutsigiro kana vachida kupinda musarudzo. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaKudakwashe Makanda, avo vanoshanda ne Youth Initiative for Community Development Trust, vanotiwo vari kubatsira vechidiki vangave madzimai kana varume kuti vazive kodzero dzavo musarudzo. Vati ichokwadi kuti kunyange vechidiki vakada kumira pasarudzo, nyaya yemari inonetsa uye panofanira kutsvagwa nzira yekuvapa mari dzekuti vapinde musarudzo. Vanoti semamimiriro akaita zvinhu vane mari kana vanobva kumhuri dzakapfuma ndivo chete vane mikana yekupinda musarudzo. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti pasi pechirongwa chavo che Her Right of Way Give Way Campaign vari kukuridzira hurumende, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira kuti apewo mukana kune vechidiki kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo dzinotevera. Vanoti vanozviziva kuti izvi zvinogona kutora nguva asi pari zvino vari kuda kuti pazvigaro makumi matanhatu zvinopihwa madzimai zvisingakwikwidze muNational Assembly makumi matatu zvinofanira kupihwa vechidiki. Mamwe masangano ari kushanda neInstitute for Young Women’s Development ndeanoti Zimbabwe Organisation for Youth in Politics, Platform for Youth Development, Plumtree Development Trust pamwe neMission To Live Trust. column2: Zvikwata zviri kundichemera: Wenger
column3: anoti zvikwata zvakawanda zvauya kwaari zvichida kumutenga apo ari kugadzirira kubva kuArsenal iyo yaarairidza kwemakore anodarika 22.   Wenger acharairidza mutambo wake wekupedzisira apo chikwata chake chichasangana neHuddewrsfield musi weSvondo.   Paakabvunzwa kuti pane zvimwe zvikwata here zviri kuuya kwaari zvichida kumutenga kuti agozvirairidze, Wenger anoti, “Hongu, zvakawandisa chaizvo. Asi handisi kumbofunga nezvazvo kana kuzvitarisa. Handidi kufunga nezvazvo panguva ino kana kutaura nezvazvo.” – SportsMail Football

column2: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reKuwanikwa neKukosheswa kweMvura Pasi Pose
column3: Nezuro, Zimbabwe yakabatana nepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekuwaniswa kwemvura yakachena kumunhu wese pasi rose, re World Water Day, iro rinocherehcedzwa pasi rose kubva muna 1993. column2: Vabereki Vane Vana Vane "Autism" Votarisana neMatambudziko Makukutu
column3: Vabereki vevana vanoita matambudziko pakutamba nevamwe kana kuita zvinhu zvinotarisirwa pazera ravo kana kuti vane "autism" vanoti vatarisana nedambudziko guru pakuriritira vana ava. Vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwakaomarara nepamusana pekuti vana vane autism havakwanisi kuita zvinhu zvinoitwa nevamwe vechidiki kana kushamwaridzana navo. Baba Luke Pencil veku Malbereign muHarare vane mwana wavo ane makore gumi ane autism. Baba Pencil, avo vane makore makumi mana nematanhatu ekuberekwa vanoti dambudziko guru rinosangana nevabereki ava nderekushaya ruzivo pamusoro pe autism. “Izvi hazvina kunge zvabatwa nana chiremba kunyange mwana akarwara kwenguva refu ndichienda kunana chiremba vakasiyana siyana nekunana mukoti vakasiyana siyana.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Pakashayikwa kana mumwechete akatibatsira chaizvo kuti mwana wenyu condition yake inonzi autism. Aiti akachema zvainzi ah, baba hamuzivi mwana anongochema, zvinoreva kuti haasi kunzwa zvakanaka kana kuti muri kumuitira zvaasingadi. Asi uchiedza kutsanangura kuti aiwa, mwana uyu pane zvaanoita zvandisinganzwisise zvakafanana nekuti dzimwe nguva anoramba kupfeka bhutsu, dzimwe nguva anoramba kugerwa musoro.” Baba Pencil vanoti vabereki vakawanda vanokatyamadzwa nekugumbuka zvikuru pavanoona kuti mwana wavo ari kukura zvakasiyana nevamwe vana. Vanoti ivo vakaita mhanza yekukurumidza kuziva zvaiitika kumwana wavo. “Vana ava vanenge vane ma censory issues anenge akavhiringika, haana kuita seevamwe vana. Saka kana achigerwa ane zvaanonzwa zvisinganzwiwi nevamwe vana vose saka achiita muitiro waanoita iwowo.” Vatiwo, “ Saka izvozvo ndizvo zvakaita kuti tinzwisise kuti ho mwana wedu condition yaaninayo inonzi autism. Izvozvo ndinoda kuti nditsinhire kuti izvi handina kuzviwana kunana chiremba kana kunana mukoti. Ndakatozvinzwawo kune mumwe mubereki akanga ari affected, akatoenda pa radio akanotaura. Ndopatazowana information yakadaro.” Baba Pencil vanoti murume nemudzimai vanofanira kubatana kwete kunongedzerana kana mwana asangana nedambudziko. “Saka izvozvo zvakatipa simba rekuti kuti mwana wedu aite zviri nani, tikwanise kumumaneja, regai tinorisecha.” Vatizve, “ Tikabva taenda pa internet. Iripo information pa internet. Ukaiwana zvinoita kuti umaneje mwana wako zviri nani. Zvinoita kuti kuwadzana kwako naye kuve kuri nani, kuwadzana kwake nenharaunda yakamukomberedza kuve nani.” Amai Emma Muchefa avo vane mwana ane autism, vanoshandira hurumende vari pa Domboshava training centre. Vanoti madzimai mazhinji ane vana vane autism anoshungurudzika zvikuru. “Vazhinji vana baba vanotiza, uye hama hadzizvitambiri. Kazhinji burden inosiyirwa amai, seni as a mother of three, two vari disabled murume akabva aenda ndikasara ndiri a single mother.” Amai Muchefa vatizve, “ Saka dambudziko rinenge rave rekuti unenge uchida kuenda kubasa, uri kuda ku physio nemwana iyeye, uri kuda zvekudya uri kuda zvekupfeka zvevana ivavo, uri kuda medication. Saka kazhinji kacho uri kuda zvekufambisa, hauna kana motor kana wheel-chair.” Amai Tendai Kamutero veku Domboshava vane mwana wavo ane autism. Vakatozozviziva mwana uyu ave nemakore matatu kuti ndizvo zvaari. Amai Kamutero vanoti kuriritira mwana uyu zvinovanetsa semunhu ari pamushando. “Pandinoenda kubasa, munhu anosara naye haanzwisisi zvaanoda nekuti haatauri.” Vatizve, “Sign language haaizivi, haakwanisi ku communicator naye. Asi iye takatozomudzidza kuti kana ave nenzara kana chikafu chiri paanosvikira anotora ega. Kana kuti ukaona akukudhonza, isaini yekuti ane nzara.” Amai Constance Mandishona vane vana vana, uye vaviri vavo vakaremara. Amai Mandishona, avo vanoshanda muhurumende vakapihwa imba yekugara kuMufakose mushure mekunge vakuru vavo vaona kutambura kwavaiita. Vanoti vakaremara vanofanira kusimudzirana. “Ipapo ndisati ndapihwa imba ndakanga ndisina pfungwa dzekuti I can advocate kana kumiririrawo kana kutsigira munhu akaremara.” Amai Mandishona vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Ndakazogara pasi ndikazvibvunza kuti, hongu ndamiririrwa, ko vari kunze uko vasina anovamiririrawo tochiita sei? Nekuti inini pandakabatsirwa nemba, Permanent secretary mai Nhekairo vakandiudza kuti, Cony, dai vana vako wanga wakavachengetesa kumaraini, vachiita kunge musara pavana, I wasn’t going to assist you. But pese patinotaura unotungamidza vana vako kumberi kuti ma’am vangu vazodai nekuti hauna kunyara navo saka tazokudai. Ndakakwanisa kubatsira vamwe vabereki vairi. Mumwe wacho anonzi mai Boora anoshanda ku President’s department. Ane mwana wakewo ane autism. Ndikamuti akoma nyaya yangu yakamira yakadai, inini ndakawanawo imba. Imimi can you not write a letter mukwanisewo kuti mubatsirwe? Vakapihwa flat ku Ardbennie.” Dr Cotilda Mangoma mugari wemuHarare uye vanofamba vachipa dzidziso pamusoro pe autism. Vanoti vabereki vevana vakadai vanofanira kushingaira kutsvaga ruzivo kuitira kuti vana vavo vave nepundutso. “Inini ndiri kuona kuti zvakakosha kuve neruzivo mukati memhuri nemhaka yekuti chinhu chawave kuziva unoziva kuti unochibata sei, unochibata nemutoo upi.” Dr Mangoma vanotizve, “Saka ini ndinoti vana baba nana mai vane vana vavasinganzwisisi kuti ingave autism here kana kwete zviri nani vatsvake rubatsiro kubva ku clinic level. Kana vabva ikoko voudzwa kuti enda ku rehabilitation. Rehabilitation yoferefeta kuti itype ipi ye autism, pamusana pekuti akasiyana siyana, akawanda. Nekuonekwa kunoita mwana, nemaitiro ake unobva waudzwa kuti aiwa ichi ndechakati, then rubatsiro rwobva rwauya. Angave anogona nezvemaoko, angave munhu ari bright kuchikoro, zvese zvinobatsirika along those lines.” VaPardon Gonorashe mushandi wehurumende ane hunyanzvi hwekubatsira veruzhinji, kunyanya vanotambura kuti vave neraramo iri nani. Vanoti vabereki vevana vane autism vanofanira kuve padyo nepavanowana ruzivo pamusoro pe autism.“Saka paida kuti patange pawanikwa centre yekuti vanhu vari kumaruwa, vangadai vari kuBinga, Muzarabani kana kuti kuMberengwa vakaona kuti vane vana vane autism they can refer vana ivavo kuno.” Vatizve,“Tikashevedza ma parents vari kumaruwa vanogona kuuya kuma campaign akaita seaya.” VaGonorashe vanoti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega kuzvirongwa zvakanangana ne autism. “Hakuna zviri kunyanya kuitwa about disability as a whole.” Vatizve, “Then mukazopinda mudisability sector imomo munozoona kuti autism is relegated kuzasizasi kune other forms of disability. Saka ngatitorei disability sector se ine mari shoma mu budget. Then yapihwa mari shoma already, autism iri kuzasizasi zvekuti ikoko kunosvika one cent. Ndosaka kune vanhu vashomanana vari kutari nezve autism as a right.” Sangano guru rezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti pavanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu ega ega mumwechete wavo anenge aine autism. Vamwe vanhu vane autism vanokwanisa kuzviriritira asi vakawanda vavo vanotozoda kuchengetwa hupenyu hwavo hwese. No media source currently available  .

column2: Guta reHarare Rotarisira Mibhedha Inodarika Mazana Matanhatu Ichashndiswa neVarwere veCovid-19
column3: Hurumende inoti kutanga svondo rinouya dunhu reHarare richange rave nemibhedha mitsva inodarika mazana matanhatu muzvipatara zveveruzhinji, uye mibhedha makumi mana nemiviri ichange iri mibhedha yevaye vanorwara zvakanyanya kana kuti vanenge vaiswa muchikamu cheIntensive Care Unit, (ICU). Izvi zvaziviswa nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, mushure mekushanyira zvimwe zvipatara zvichange zvichirapa varwere veCovid-19, zvakaita seParirenyatwa, Wilkins neBeatrice Infectious Diseases Hospital. VaMangwiro, avo vange vaine gurukota redunhu reHarare, VaOliver Chidhau, vati vari kufara chose negadziriro iri kuitwa pachipatara cheParirenyatwa icho chichange chave chipatara chikuru chinorapa Covid-19 munyika yose. VaMangwiiro vati pane zvinhu zvishomanana zvakatengwa kuSouth Africa zviri kusvika mukupera kwesvondo uye svondo rinouya, chipatara ichi chinenge chave kutambira varwere veCovid 19. Parirenyatwa ichange iine mibhedha mazana mana nemakumi mashanu uye makumi maviri nemisere inenge iri yeICU. Wilkins, iyo iri kurapa varwere veCovid 19, ine mibhedha makumi matanhatu nemumwe chete, mishanu iri yeICU. Kana ichinge yapera kugadzirwa, Beatrice ichange yave nemibhedha makumi masere, gumi iri yeICU. Dr Mangwiro vati chinofadza ndechekuti kuParirenyatwa neWilkims michina inobatsira varwere kufema kana kumaVentilators, atoveko. PaParirenyatwa vashandi vange vari mushishi rekugadzira mipanda kuchikamu cheCovid-19 uye zvinhu zvizhinji zvatove muWard. Vakuru vepachipatara ichi vati pane zvavakamirira kubva kuSouth Africa zvekuisa mumaTheatres nemaLabaoratories zvekuti svondo rinouuya chipatara ichi chinenge chave kurapa pamwe nekuvheneka hutachiwana hweCoronavirus, Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Proper Chonzi, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo chipatara chavo cheWilkins chave kukwanisa kurapa varwere veCovid -19, vachiri kuda zvekushandisa zvakawanda. Pavanhu vese makumi matatu nevanomwe vakakabatwa neCovid 19, makumi mashanu vakarapwa paWilkins, uye pavana vakafa, vaviri vakafira pachipatara ichi. Pari zvino paWilkins pane murwere mumwe weCovid 19 ari pachipatara ichi. Gurukota redunhu reHarare , VaOliver Chidhau, vati vangafara chose kana pakava nemibhedha inodarika chiuru yakamirira varwere beCovid -19 chete mudunhu ravo rese. Kunyange hazvo zvipatara zviri kuhadzirwa kuti zvikwanise kurapa Covid-19, Dr Mangwiro vati kana chirwere ichi chikaparira zvakanyanya, vachashandisa nhandare dzenhabvu nemimwe mitambo, nezvivakwa zvakaita semachechi kurapira varwere veCovid-19. Zimbabwe, senyika dzakawanda pasi rose, yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiona hwe corona virus, uhwo hunokonzera chirwere che Covid-19. Kusvika pari zvino, chirwere ichi, icho chakatanga kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana nemazana mana ezviuru, uye chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvisere pasi rose. column2: Tsiva mberi, mari mumashure-Musonda
column3: MURAIRIDZI wetsiva ane mukurumbira arizve nyanzvi yekuronga mitambo uyu, Clyde Musonda, anoti vatambi pakutanga havafanire kutungamidza mari asi kuti vagadzire mazita avo.   Achitaura neKwayedza, Musonda anoti chinodiwa mumutambo wetsiva kuti munhu atange agadzira zita rake, zvemari zvozotevera.   “Tsiva pari zvino haina mari, vatsigirri chaivo hakuna. Asi vatambi tinovakurudzira kuti ngavasatungamidza mari sezvo chikuru kuti vagadzire mazita avo.   “Zita ndiro rakakosha nekuti ukahwina mitambo yakawanda uchirwira nzungu, mitambo ine mari inotanga kuuya uye kana mapuromota ekunze anotanga kukutsvaga voda kushanda newe nekuti vanenge vaona chiedza chakanaka pauri,” anodaro Musonda.   Musonda pari zvino ari kurairidza vatambi vatanhatu muchikwata chake cheDeltaforce Boxing Academy achitsigirwa neGypsite Sports Promotions.   Pavatambi vatanhatu ava, vana ndevemuZimbabwe nevaviri vekuMalawi.   VemuZimbabwe ndiTinashe “Chairman” Madziwana uyo anova shasha ine bhande reZimbabwe National Super Bantamweight, Collin Nyamambisha anorwa muboka reheavyweight, Simon Madanhire naTinashe Mutodza kuchizoti vatambi vekuMalawi ndiAnisha Bashil naIsreal Kamwamba.

column2: Maonero eHurumende yeAmerica Mukudyidzana neChina.
column3: Kwemakore akawanda, hurumende yeAmerica yange ichikumbira China mune zvakanaka kuti imire mabasa ehutsotsi, kumbunyikidza uye kusora muAmerica. Asi kwemakore ose aya China yange ichiramba kuteerera. Nenyaya yekuita hunhinhi uku, America yakazomanikidzwa kuvhara muzinda weChina kuHouston, Texas mushure mekunge China yayedza kutora zvisiri pamutemo hunyanzvi hwezvekugadzia mishonga uye kuda kupa chiokomuhomwe kune vanhu makumi mashanu vanoshanda pamakambani anogadzira mishonga aya kuti vapihwe magwaro akakosha ekugadzira mishonga nehumwe humhizha. China iri kuyedzawo kutyisidzira zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zviri muAmerica zvinopikisa kuti zvidzokere kumusha. Zvakaitwa neChina kuHouston zvakapfurikidza zvakanyanya zvakasiya hurumende yeAmerica isina chimwe chekuita kunze kwekuvhara muzinda uyu. Iri rimwe danho rakaomarara ratorwa neAmerica kudzivisa China iyo yopinda nemwenje mudziva. Kwemakore, vamiriri veChina vange vachibatwa zvakanaka neAmerica asi ivo vachibata vamiriri veAmerica munyika yavo neseri kweruoko. Izvi handi zvinhu zvakanaka. Asi hamusi muAmerica chete umo vamiriri veChina vanozvidza nyika inovaremekedza. Kubiwa kwemagwaro enjere neChina rave dambudziko rakomba pasi rose. Mazuva mashoma adarika matare emuAmerica akawana zvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina zviviri Li Xiaoyu naDong Jiazhi zviine mhosva yekusora makambani emuAmerica nekuba zvakakosha pamacomputer. Vaviri ava vakange vapedza makore gumi vachisora nekuba magwaro akakosha ane humhizha hwepamusoro hwemaindustry kunyika dzinosanganisira United States, Australia, Belgium, Germany, Japan, Lithuania, the Netherlands, Spain, South Korea, Sweden, ne United Kingdom. Zvose izvi zvinoratidza kuti China inodya zvevapfupi nekureba mukuda kwayo kuti ive nyika ine hupfumi hwakasimba pasi rose. No media source currently available

column2: ZCTU Inotambira Kuvepo kweTNF iri paMutemo
column3: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro kuvepo kwemutemo unotara mashandiro eTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF. Musangano wekutanga weTNF pave nemutemo uyu uri kutarisirwa kuitwa nemusi weChitatu svondo rino, apo panotarisirwawo kukurukurwa zvakati wandeyi zvinobata TNF zvakaunganidzwa masvondo maviri adarika pamusangano wakaitwa kuKadoma. VaMoyo vanoti zvimwe zvichakurukurwa zvichabva kukomiti yakaiswa kuti itarise matambudziko akatarisana nenyika mune zveupfumi uye zvinosanganisira matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anosanganisira kushaikwa kwemagetsi nemvura munyika. column2: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kurawara neCovid-19 muNyika Hwowedzera Zvakanyanya
column3: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uho hwainge hwamboderera kusvika pazana nemakumi matanhatu nemana kana kuti 164 musi wa12 Gumiguru hwatanga kuwedzerazve zvakanyanya. NeMugovera bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uye vose havana nhoroondo yekushanya kunze kwenyika. Izvi zviri kureva kuti vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vave mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevatatu kana kuti 433. MuBulawayo ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara vanosvika zana negumi nevatanhatu, Harare ine makumi manomwe nemumwe, Matabeleland South ine makumi matanhatu nemumwe, Matabeleland North makumi mashanu nevatanhatu uye dunhu rine vanhu vashoma shoma vari kurwara iMashonaland West ine vanhu vasere. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nematanhatu kana kuti 8, 786. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino vave zviuru zvisere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 8, 096 mushure mekupora kwevanhu vasere neMugovera. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizino vave mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 257. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mana nemasere ane zana nemana kana kuti 47, 104. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1, 6 million. South Africa ine vanhu vave kusvika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 750 000 vabatwa nechirwere icgi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemana kana kuti 54 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica chete vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 245, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave kuda kusvika mamiriyoni gumi nechimwe kana kuti 11 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9. Asi vapora vachida kusvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti 35 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vati vanhu vanofanira kugara vakangwarira nekuti vakarivara chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine hukasha zvochoiita muAmerica, Britain nedzimwe nyika.
